00098 void printf_strip(Sequence *seq)
00099 {
00100     fprintf(stderr, "name: '%s', len:%d, start:%d, (startofs:%d, endofs:%d), (startstill:%d, endstill:%d), machine:%d, (startdisp:%d, enddisp:%d)\n",
00101             seq->name, seq->len, seq->start, seq->startofs, seq->endofs, seq->startstill, seq->endstill, seq->machine, seq->startdisp, seq->enddisp);
00102     fprintf(stderr, "\tseq_tx_set_final_left: %d %d\n\n", seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0), seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0));
00103 }
00104 
00105 int seqbase_recursive_apply(ListBase *seqbase, int (*apply_func)(Sequence *seq, void *), void *arg)
00106 {
00107     Sequence *iseq;
00108     for (iseq = seqbase->first; iseq; iseq = iseq->next) {
00109         if (seq_recursive_apply(iseq, apply_func, arg) == -1)
00110             return -1;  /* bail out */
00111     }
00112     return 1;
00113 }
00114 
00115 int seq_recursive_apply(Sequence *seq, int (*apply_func)(Sequence *, void *), void *arg)
00116 {
00117     int ret = apply_func(seq, arg);
00118 
00119     if (ret == -1)
00120         return -1;  /* bail out */
00121 
00122     if (ret && seq->seqbase.first)
00123         ret = seqbase_recursive_apply(&seq->seqbase, apply_func, arg);
00124 
00125     return ret;
00126 }

00134 static void free_proxy_seq(Sequence *seq)
00135 {
00136     if (seq->strip && seq->strip->proxy && seq->strip->proxy->anim) {
00137         IMB_free_anim(seq->strip->proxy->anim);
00138         seq->strip->proxy->anim = NULL;
00139     }
00140 }
00141 
00142 void seq_free_strip(Strip *strip)
00143 {
00144     strip->us--;
00145     if (strip->us > 0) return;
00146     if (strip->us < 0) {
00147         printf("error: negative users in strip\n");
00148         return;
00149     }
00150 
00151     if (strip->stripdata) {
00152         MEM_freeN(strip->stripdata);
00153     }
00154 
00155     if (strip->proxy) {
00156         if (strip->proxy->anim) {
00157             IMB_free_anim(strip->proxy->anim);
00158         }
00159 
00160         MEM_freeN(strip->proxy);
00161     }
00162     if (strip->crop) {
00163         MEM_freeN(strip->crop);
00164     }
00165     if (strip->transform) {
00166         MEM_freeN(strip->transform);
00167     }
00168     if (strip->color_balance) {
00169         MEM_freeN(strip->color_balance);
00170     }
00171 
00172     MEM_freeN(strip);
00173 }
00174 
00175 void seq_free_sequence(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
00176 {
00177     if (seq->strip) seq_free_strip(seq->strip);
00178 
00179     if (seq->anim) IMB_free_anim(seq->anim);
00180 
00181     if (seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) {
00182         struct SeqEffectHandle sh = get_sequence_effect(seq);
00183 
00184         sh.free(seq);
00185     }
00186 
00187     if (seq->sound) {
00188         ((ID *)seq->sound)->us--; 
00189     }
00190 
00191     /* clipboard has no scene and will never have a sound handle or be active */
00192     if (scene) {
00193         Editing *ed = scene->ed;
00194 
00195         if (ed->act_seq == seq)
00196             ed->act_seq = NULL;
00197 
00198         if (seq->scene_sound && ELEM(seq->type, SEQ_SOUND, SEQ_SCENE))
00199             sound_remove_scene_sound(scene, seq->scene_sound);
00200 
00201         seq_free_animdata(scene, seq);
00202     }
00203 
00204     MEM_freeN(seq);
00205 }
00206 
00207 void seq_free_sequence_recurse(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
00208 {
00209     Sequence *iseq;
00210 
00211     for (iseq = seq->seqbase.first; iseq; iseq = iseq->next) {
00212         seq_free_sequence_recurse(scene, iseq);
00213     }
00214 
00215     seq_free_sequence(scene, seq);
00216 }

00222         Editing *ed;
00223

00226     }

00230 static void seq_free_clipboard_recursive(Sequence *seq_parent)
00231 {
00232     Sequence *seq, *nseq;
00233 
00234     for (seq = seq_parent->seqbase.first; seq; seq = nseq) {
00235         nseq = seq->next;
00236         seq_free_clipboard_recursive(seq);
00237     }
00238 
00239     seq_free_sequence(NULL, seq_parent);
00240 }
00241 
00242 void seq_free_clipboard(void)
00243 {
00244     Sequence *seq, *nseq;
00245 
00246     for (seq = seqbase_clipboard.first; seq; seq = nseq) {
00247         nseq = seq->next;
00248         seq_free_clipboard_recursive(seq);
00249     }
00250     seqbase_clipboard.first = seqbase_clipboard.last = NULL;
00251 }
00252 
00253 void seq_free_editing(Scene *scene)
00254 {
00255     Editing *ed = scene->ed;
00256     MetaStack *ms;
00257     Sequence *seq;
00258 
00259     if (ed == NULL)
00260         return;
00261 
00262     SEQ_BEGIN(ed, seq)
00263     {
00264         seq_free_sequence(scene, seq);
00265     }
00266     SEQ_END
00267 
00268     while ((ms = ed->metastack.first)) {
00269         BLI_remlink(&ed->metastack, ms);
00270         MEM_freeN(ms);
00271     }
00272 
00273     MEM_freeN(ed);
00274 }

00280 SeqRenderData seq_new_render_data(
00281         struct Main *bmain, struct Scene *scene,
00282         int rectx, int recty, int preview_render_size)
00283 {
00284     SeqRenderData rval;
00285 
00286     rval.bmain = bmain;
00287     rval.scene = scene;
00288     rval.rectx = rectx;
00289     rval.recty = recty;
00290     rval.preview_render_size = preview_render_size;
00291     rval.motion_blur_samples = 0;
00292     rval.motion_blur_shutter = 0;
00293 
00294     return rval;

00296 
00297 int seq_cmp_render_data(const SeqRenderData *a, const SeqRenderData *b)
00298 {
00299     if (a->preview_render_size < b->preview_render_size) {
00300         return -1;
00301     }
00302     if (a->preview_render_size > b->preview_render_size) {
00303         return 1;
00304     }
00305     
00306     if (a->rectx < b->rectx) {
00307         return -1;
00308     }
00309     if (a->rectx > b->rectx) {
00310         return 1;
00311     }
00312 
00313     if (a->recty < b->recty) {
00314         return -1;
00315     }
00316     if (a->recty > b->recty) {
00317         return 1;
00318     }
00319 
00320     if (a->bmain < b->bmain) {
00321         return -1;
00322     }
00323     if (a->bmain > b->bmain) {
00324         return 1;
00325     }
00326 
00327     if (a->scene < b->scene) {
00328         return -1;
00329     }
00330     if (a->scene > b->scene) {
00331         return 1;
00332     }
00333 
00334     if (a->motion_blur_shutter < b->motion_blur_shutter) {
00335         return -1;
00336     }
00337     if (a->motion_blur_shutter > b->motion_blur_shutter) {
00338         return 1;
00339     }
00340 
00341     if (a->motion_blur_samples < b->motion_blur_samples) {
00342         return -1;
00343     }
00344     if (a->motion_blur_samples > b->motion_blur_samples) {
00345         return 1;
00346     }
00347 
00348     return 0;
00349 }
00350 
00351 unsigned int seq_hash_render_data(const SeqRenderData *a)
00352 {
00353     unsigned int rval = a->rectx + a->recty;
00354 
00355     rval ^= a->preview_render_size;
00356     rval ^= ((intptr_t) a->bmain) << 6;
00357     rval ^= ((intptr_t) a->scene) << 6;
00358     rval ^= (int)(a->motion_blur_shutter * 100.0f) << 10;
00359     rval ^= a->motion_blur_samples << 24;
00360     
00361     return rval;
00362 }

00368 /* sequence strip iterator:
00369  * - builds a full array, recursively into meta strips */
00370 
00371 static void seq_count(ListBase *seqbase, int *tot)
00372 {
00373     Sequence *seq;
00374 
00375     for (seq = seqbase->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00376         (*tot)++;
00377 
00378         if (seq->seqbase.first)
00379             seq_count(&seq->seqbase, tot);
00380     }
00381 }
00382 
00383 static void seq_build_array(ListBase *seqbase, Sequence ***array, int depth)
00384 {
00385     Sequence *seq;
00386 
00387     for (seq = seqbase->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00388         seq->depth = depth;
00389 
00390         if (seq->seqbase.first)
00391             seq_build_array(&seq->seqbase, array, depth + 1);
00392 
00393         **array = seq;
00394         (*array)++;
00395     }
00396 }
00397 
00398 void seq_array(Editing *ed, Sequence ***seqarray, int *tot, int use_pointer)
00399 {
00400     Sequence **array;
00401 
00402     *seqarray = NULL;
00403     *tot = 0;
00404 
00405     if (ed == NULL)
00406         return;
00407 
00408     if (use_pointer)
00409         seq_count(ed->seqbasep, tot);
00410     else
00411         seq_count(&ed->seqbase, tot);
00412 
00413     if (*tot == 0)
00414         return;
00415 
00416     *seqarray = array = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(Sequence *) * (*tot), "SeqArray");
00417     if (use_pointer)
00418         seq_build_array(ed->seqbasep, &array, 0);
00419     else
00420         seq_build_array(&ed->seqbase, &array, 0);
00421 }
00422 
00423 void seq_begin(Editing *ed, SeqIterator *iter, int use_pointer)
00424 {
00425     memset(iter, 0, sizeof(*iter));
00426     seq_array(ed, &iter->array, &iter->tot, use_pointer);
00427 
00428     if (iter->tot) {
00429         iter->cur = 0;
00430         iter->seq = iter->array[iter->cur];
00431         iter->valid = 1;
00432     }
00433 }
00434 
00435 void seq_next(SeqIterator *iter)
00436 {
00437     if (++iter->cur < iter->tot)
00438         iter->seq = iter->array[iter->cur];
00439     else
00440         iter->valid = 0;
00441 }
00442 
00443 void seq_end(SeqIterator *iter)
00444 {
00445     if (iter->array)
00446         MEM_freeN(iter->array);
00447 
00448     iter->valid = 0;
00449 }

00451 /*
00452  * **********************************************************************
00453  * build_seqar
00454  * *********************************************************************
00455  * Build a complete array of _all_ sequencies (including those
00456  * in metastrips!)
00457  * *********************************************************************
00458  */
00459 
00460 static void do_seq_count_cb(ListBase *seqbase, int *totseq,
00461                             int (*test_func)(Sequence *seq))
00462 {
00463     Sequence *seq;
00464 
00465     seq = seqbase->first;
00466     while (seq) {
00467         int test = test_func(seq);
00468         if (test & BUILD_SEQAR_COUNT_CURRENT) {
00469             (*totseq)++;
00470         }
00471         if (seq->seqbase.first && (test & BUILD_SEQAR_COUNT_CHILDREN)) {
00472             do_seq_count_cb(&seq->seqbase, totseq, test_func);
00473         }
00474         seq = seq->next;
00475     }
00476 }
00477 
00478 static void do_build_seqar_cb(ListBase *seqbase, Sequence ***seqar, int depth,
00479                               int (*test_func)(Sequence *seq))
00480 {
00481     Sequence *seq;
00482 
00483     seq = seqbase->first;
00484     while (seq) {
00485         int test = test_func(seq);
00486         seq->depth = depth;
00487 
00488         if (seq->seqbase.first && (test & BUILD_SEQAR_COUNT_CHILDREN)) {
00489             do_build_seqar_cb(&seq->seqbase, seqar, depth + 1, test_func);
00490         }
00491         if (test & BUILD_SEQAR_COUNT_CURRENT) {
00492             **seqar = seq;
00493             (*seqar)++;
00494         }
00495         seq = seq->next;
00496     }
00497 }
00498 
00499 void build_seqar_cb(ListBase *seqbase, Sequence  ***seqar, int *totseq,
00500                     int (*test_func)(Sequence *seq))
00501 {
00502     Sequence **tseqar;
00503 
00504     *totseq = 0;
00505     do_seq_count_cb(seqbase, totseq, test_func);
00506 
00507     if (*totseq == 0) {
00508         *seqar = NULL;
00509         return;
00510     }
00511     *seqar = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(void *) * *totseq, "seqar");
00512     tseqar = *seqar;
00513 
00514     do_build_seqar_cb(seqbase, seqar, 0, test_func);
00515     *seqar = tseqar;
00516 }
00517 
00518 
00519 static void seq_update_sound_bounds_recursive(Scene *scene, Sequence *metaseq)
00520 {
00521     Sequence *seq;
00522 
00523     /* for sound we go over full meta tree to update bounds of the sound strips,
00524      * since sound is played outside of evaluating the imbufs, */
00525     for (seq = metaseq->seqbase.first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00526         if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
00527             seq_update_sound_bounds_recursive(scene, seq);
00528         }
00529         else if (ELEM(seq->type, SEQ_SOUND, SEQ_SCENE)) {
00530             if (seq->scene_sound) {
00531                 int startofs = seq->startofs;
00532                 int endofs = seq->endofs;
00533                 if (seq->startofs + seq->start < metaseq->start + metaseq->startofs)
00534                     startofs = metaseq->start + metaseq->startofs - seq->start;
00535 
00536                 if (seq->start + seq->len - seq->endofs > metaseq->start + metaseq->len - metaseq->endofs)
00537                     endofs = seq->start + seq->len - metaseq->start - metaseq->len + metaseq->endofs;
00538                 sound_move_scene_sound(scene, seq->scene_sound, seq->start + startofs, seq->start + seq->len - endofs, startofs);
00539             }
00540         }
00541     }
00542 }
00543 
00544 void calc_sequence_disp(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
00545 {
00546     if (seq->startofs && seq->startstill) seq->startstill = 0;
00547     if (seq->endofs && seq->endstill) seq->endstill = 0;
00548     
00549     seq->startdisp = seq->start + seq->startofs - seq->startstill;
00550     seq->enddisp = seq->start + seq->len - seq->endofs + seq->endstill;
00551     
00552     seq->handsize = 10.0;  /* 10 frames */
00553     if (seq->enddisp - seq->startdisp < 10) {
00554         seq->handsize = (float)(0.5 * (seq->enddisp - seq->startdisp));
00555     }
00556     else if (seq->enddisp - seq->startdisp > 250) {
00557         seq->handsize = (float)((seq->enddisp - seq->startdisp) / 25);
00558     }
00559 
00560     if (ELEM(seq->type, SEQ_SOUND, SEQ_SCENE)) {
00561         seq_update_sound_bounds(scene, seq);
00562     }
00563     else if (seq->type == SEQ_META)
00564         seq_update_sound_bounds_recursive(scene, seq);
00565 }
00566 
00567 void calc_sequence(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
00568 {
00569     Sequence *seqm;
00570     int min, max;
00571 
00572     /* check all metas recursively */
00573     seqm = seq->seqbase.first;
00574     while (seqm) {
00575         if (seqm->seqbase.first) calc_sequence(scene, seqm);
00576         seqm = seqm->next;
00577     }
00578 
00579     /* effects and meta: automatic start and end */
00580 
00581     if (seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) {
00582         /* pointers */
00583         if (seq->seq2 == NULL) seq->seq2 = seq->seq1;
00584         if (seq->seq3 == NULL) seq->seq3 = seq->seq1;
00585 
00586         /* effecten go from seq1 -> seq2: test */
00587 
00588         /* we take the largest start and smallest end */
00589 
00590         // seq->start= seq->startdisp= MAX2(seq->seq1->startdisp, seq->seq2->startdisp);
00591         // seq->enddisp= MIN2(seq->seq1->enddisp, seq->seq2->enddisp);
00592 
00593         if (seq->seq1) {
00594             /* XXX These resets should not be necessary, but users used to be able to
00595              *     edit effect's length, leading to strange results. See [#29190] */
00596             seq->startofs = seq->endofs = seq->startstill = seq->endstill = 0;
00597             seq->start = seq->startdisp = MAX3(seq->seq1->startdisp, seq->seq2->startdisp, seq->seq3->startdisp);
00598             seq->enddisp = MIN3(seq->seq1->enddisp, seq->seq2->enddisp, seq->seq3->enddisp);
00599             /* we cant help if strips don't overlap, it wont give useful results.
00600              * but at least ensure 'len' is never negative which causes bad bugs elsewhere. */
00601             if (seq->enddisp < seq->startdisp) {
00602                 /* simple start/end swap */
00603                 seq->start = seq->enddisp;
00604                 seq->enddisp = seq->startdisp;
00605                 seq->startdisp = seq->start;
00606                 seq->flag |= SEQ_INVALID_EFFECT;
00607             }
00608             else {
00609                 seq->flag &= ~SEQ_INVALID_EFFECT;
00610             }
00611 
00612             seq->len = seq->enddisp - seq->startdisp;
00613         }
00614         else {
00615             calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);
00616         }
00617     }
00618     else {
00619         if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
00620             seqm = seq->seqbase.first;
00621             if (seqm) {
00622                 min =  MAXFRAME * 2;
00623                 max = -MAXFRAME * 2;
00624                 while (seqm) {
00625                     if (seqm->startdisp < min) min = seqm->startdisp;
00626                     if (seqm->enddisp > max) max = seqm->enddisp;
00627                     seqm = seqm->next;
00628                 }
00629                 seq->start = min + seq->anim_startofs;
00630                 seq->len = max - min;
00631                 seq->len -= seq->anim_startofs;
00632                 seq->len -= seq->anim_endofs;
00633             }
00634             seq_update_sound_bounds_recursive(scene, seq);
00635         }
00636         calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);
00637     }
00638 }
00639 
00640 /* note: caller should run calc_sequence(scene, seq) after */
00641 void reload_sequence_new_file(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq, int lock_range)
00642 {
00643     char str[FILE_MAX];
00644     int prev_startdisp = 0, prev_enddisp = 0;
00645     /* note: don't rename the strip, will break animation curves */
00646 
00647     if (ELEM6(seq->type, SEQ_MOVIE, SEQ_IMAGE, SEQ_SOUND, SEQ_SCENE, SEQ_META, SEQ_MOVIECLIP) == 0) {
00648         return;
00649     }
00650 
00651     if (lock_range) {
00652         /* keep so we don't have to move the actual start and end points (only the data) */
00653         calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);
00654         prev_startdisp = seq->startdisp;
00655         prev_enddisp = seq->enddisp;
00656     }
00657 
00658     switch (seq->type) {
00659         case SEQ_IMAGE:
00660         {
00661             /* Hack? */
00662             size_t olen = MEM_allocN_len(seq->strip->stripdata) / sizeof(struct StripElem);
00663 
00664             seq->len = olen;
00665             seq->len -= seq->anim_startofs;
00666             seq->len -= seq->anim_endofs;
00667             if (seq->len < 0) {
00668                 seq->len = 0;
00669             }
00670             break;
00671         }
00672         case SEQ_MOVIE:
00673             BLI_join_dirfile(str, sizeof(str), seq->strip->dir,
00674                              seq->strip->stripdata->name);
00675             BLI_path_abs(str, G.main->name);
00676 
00677             if (seq->anim) IMB_free_anim(seq->anim);
00678             seq->anim = openanim(str, IB_rect | ((seq->flag & SEQ_FILTERY) ? IB_animdeinterlace : 0), seq->streamindex);
00679 
00680             if (!seq->anim) {
00681                 return;
00682             }
00683 
00684             seq->len = IMB_anim_get_duration(seq->anim,
00685                                              seq->strip->proxy ?
00686                                              seq->strip->proxy->tc :
00687                                              IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN);
00688     
00689             seq->anim_preseek = IMB_anim_get_preseek(seq->anim);
00690 
00691             seq->len -= seq->anim_startofs;
00692             seq->len -= seq->anim_endofs;
00693             if (seq->len < 0) {
00694                 seq->len = 0;
00695             }
00696             break;
00697         case SEQ_MOVIECLIP:
00698             seq->len = BKE_movieclip_get_duration(seq->clip);
00699 
00700             seq->len -= seq->anim_startofs;
00701             seq->len -= seq->anim_endofs;
00702             if (seq->len < 0) {
00703                 seq->len = 0;
00704             }
00705             break;
00706         case SEQ_SOUND:
00707 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
00708             if (!seq->sound)
00709                 return;
00710             seq->len = ceil(AUD_getInfo(seq->sound->playback_handle).length * FPS);
00711             seq->len -= seq->anim_startofs;
00712             seq->len -= seq->anim_endofs;
00713             if (seq->len < 0) {
00714                 seq->len = 0;
00715             }
00716 #else
00717             return;
00718 #endif
00719             break;
00720         case SEQ_SCENE:
00721         {
00722             seq->len = (seq->scene) ? seq->scene->r.efra - seq->scene->r.sfra + 1 : 0;
00723             seq->len -= seq->anim_startofs;
00724             seq->len -= seq->anim_endofs;
00725             if (seq->len < 0) {
00726                 seq->len = 0;
00727             }
00728             break;
00729         }
00730     }
00731 
00732     free_proxy_seq(seq);
00733 
00734     if (lock_range) {
00735         seq_tx_set_final_left(seq, prev_startdisp);
00736         seq_tx_set_final_right(seq, prev_enddisp);
00737         seq_single_fix(seq);
00738     }
00739     
00740     calc_sequence(scene, seq);
00741 }
00742 
00743 void sort_seq(Scene *scene)
00744 {
00745     /* all strips together per kind, and in order of y location ("machine") */
00746     ListBase seqbase, effbase;
00747     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
00748     Sequence *seq, *seqt;
00749 
00750     
00751     if (ed == NULL) return;
00752 
00753     seqbase.first = seqbase.last = NULL;
00754     effbase.first = effbase.last = NULL;
00755 
00756     while ( (seq = ed->seqbasep->first) ) {
00757         BLI_remlink(ed->seqbasep, seq);
00758 
00759         if (seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) {
00760             seqt = effbase.first;
00761             while (seqt) {
00762                 if (seqt->machine >= seq->machine) {
00763                     BLI_insertlinkbefore(&effbase, seqt, seq);
00764                     break;
00765                 }
00766                 seqt = seqt->next;
00767             }
00768             if (seqt == NULL) BLI_addtail(&effbase, seq);
00769         }
00770         else {
00771             seqt = seqbase.first;
00772             while (seqt) {
00773                 if (seqt->machine >= seq->machine) {
00774                     BLI_insertlinkbefore(&seqbase, seqt, seq);
00775                     break;
00776                 }
00777                 seqt = seqt->next;
00778             }
00779             if (seqt == NULL) BLI_addtail(&seqbase, seq);
00780         }
00781     }
00782 
00783     BLI_movelisttolist(&seqbase, &effbase);
00784     *(ed->seqbasep) = seqbase;
00785 }
00786 
00787 
00788 static int clear_scene_in_allseqs_cb(Sequence *seq, void *arg_pt)
00789 {
00790     if (seq->scene == (Scene *)arg_pt)
00791         seq->scene = NULL;
00792     return 1;
00793 }
00794 
00795 void clear_scene_in_allseqs(Main *bmain, Scene *scene)
00796 {
00797     Scene *scene_iter;
00798 
00799     /* when a scene is deleted: test all seqs */
00800     for (scene_iter = bmain->scene.first; scene_iter; scene_iter = scene_iter->id.next) {
00801         if (scene_iter != scene && scene_iter->ed) {
00802             seqbase_recursive_apply(&scene_iter->ed->seqbase, clear_scene_in_allseqs_cb, scene);
00803         }
00804     }
00805 }
00806 
00807 typedef struct SeqUniqueInfo {
00808     Sequence *seq;
00809     char name_src[SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR];
00810     char name_dest[SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR];
00811     int count;
00812     int match;
00813 } SeqUniqueInfo;
00814 
00815 #if 0
00816 static void seqbase_unique_name(ListBase *seqbasep, Sequence *seq)
00817 {
00818     BLI_uniquename(seqbasep, seq, "Sequence", '.', offsetof(Sequence, name), SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR);
00819 }
00820 #endif
00821 
00822 static void seqbase_unique_name(ListBase *seqbasep, SeqUniqueInfo *sui)
00823 {
00824     Sequence *seq;
00825     for (seq = seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
00826         if (sui->seq != seq && strcmp(sui->name_dest, seq->name + 2) == 0) {
00827             /* SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR - 2 for prefix, -1 for \0, -4 for the number */
00828             BLI_snprintf(sui->name_dest, sizeof(sui->name_dest), "%.59s.%03d",  sui->name_src, sui->count++);
00829             sui->match = 1; /* be sure to re-scan */
00830         }
00831     }
00832 }
00833 
00834 static int seqbase_unique_name_recursive_cb(Sequence *seq, void *arg_pt)
00835 {
00836     if (seq->seqbase.first)
00837         seqbase_unique_name(&seq->seqbase, (SeqUniqueInfo *)arg_pt);
00838     return 1;
00839 }
00840 
00841 void seqbase_unique_name_recursive(ListBase *seqbasep, struct Sequence *seq)
00842 {
00843     SeqUniqueInfo sui;
00844     char *dot;
00845     sui.seq = seq;
00846     BLI_strncpy(sui.name_src, seq->name + 2, sizeof(sui.name_src));
00847     BLI_strncpy(sui.name_dest, seq->name + 2, sizeof(sui.name_dest));
00848 
00849     sui.count = 1;
00850     sui.match = 1; /* assume the worst to start the loop */
00851 
00852     /* Strip off the suffix */
00853     if ((dot = strrchr(sui.name_src, '.'))) {
00854         *dot = '\0';
00855         dot++;
00856 
00857         if (*dot)
00858             sui.count = atoi(dot) + 1;
00859     }
00860 
00861     while (sui.match) {
00862         sui.match = 0;
00863         seqbase_unique_name(seqbasep, &sui);
00864         seqbase_recursive_apply(seqbasep, seqbase_unique_name_recursive_cb, &sui);
00865     }
00866 
00867     BLI_strncpy(seq->name + 2, sui.name_dest, sizeof(seq->name) - 2);
00868 }
00869 
00870 static const char *give_seqname_by_type(int type)
00871 {
00872     switch (type) {
00873         case SEQ_META:       return "Meta";
00874         case SEQ_IMAGE:      return "Image";
00875         case SEQ_SCENE:      return "Scene";
00876         case SEQ_MOVIE:      return "Movie";
00877         case SEQ_MOVIECLIP:  return "Clip";
00878         case SEQ_SOUND:      return "Audio";
00879         case SEQ_CROSS:      return "Cross";
00880         case SEQ_GAMCROSS:   return "Gamma Cross";
00881         case SEQ_ADD:        return "Add";
00882         case SEQ_SUB:        return "Sub";
00883         case SEQ_MUL:        return "Mul";
00884         case SEQ_ALPHAOVER:  return "Alpha Over";
00885         case SEQ_ALPHAUNDER: return "Alpha Under";
00886         case SEQ_OVERDROP:   return "Over Drop";
00887         case SEQ_WIPE:       return "Wipe";
00888         case SEQ_GLOW:       return "Glow";
00889         case SEQ_TRANSFORM:  return "Transform";
00890         case SEQ_COLOR:      return "Color";
00891         case SEQ_MULTICAM:   return "Multicam";
00892         case SEQ_ADJUSTMENT: return "Adjustment";
00893         case SEQ_SPEED:      return "Speed";
00894         default:
00895             return NULL;
00896     }
00897 }
00898 
00899 const char *give_seqname(Sequence *seq)
00900 {
00901     const char *name = give_seqname_by_type(seq->type);
00902 
00903     if (!name) {
00904         if (seq->type < SEQ_EFFECT) {
00905             return seq->strip->dir;
00906         }
00907         else if (seq->type == SEQ_PLUGIN) {
00908             if (!(seq->flag & SEQ_EFFECT_NOT_LOADED) &&
00909                 seq->plugin && seq->plugin->doit)
00910             {
00911                 return seq->plugin->pname;
00912             }
00913             else {
00914                 return "Plugin";
00915             }
00916         }
00917         else {
00918             return "Effect";
00919         }
00920     }
00921     return name;
00922 }
00923 
00924 /* ***************** DO THE SEQUENCE ***************** */
00925 
00926 static void make_black_ibuf(ImBuf *ibuf)
00927 {
00928     unsigned int *rect;
00929     float *rect_float;
00930     int tot;
00931 
00932     if (ibuf == NULL || (ibuf->rect == NULL && ibuf->rect_float == NULL)) {
00933         return;
00934     }
00935 
00936     tot = ibuf->x * ibuf->y;
00937 
00938     rect = ibuf->rect;
00939     rect_float = ibuf->rect_float;
00940 
00941     if (rect) {
00942         memset(rect,       0, tot * sizeof(char) * 4);
00943     }
00944 
00945     if (rect_float) {
00946         memset(rect_float, 0, tot * sizeof(float) * 4);
00947     }
00948 }
00949 
00950 static void multibuf(ImBuf *ibuf, float fmul)
00951 {
00952     char *rt;
00953     float *rt_float;
00954 
00955     int a, mul, icol;
00956 
00957     mul = (int)(256.0f * fmul);
00958     rt = (char *)ibuf->rect;
00959     rt_float = ibuf->rect_float;
00960 
00961     if (rt) {
00962         a = ibuf->x * ibuf->y;
00963         while (a--) {
00964 
00965             icol = (mul * rt[0]) >> 8;
00966             if (icol > 254) rt[0] = 255; else rt[0] = icol;
00967             icol = (mul * rt[1]) >> 8;
00968             if (icol > 254) rt[1] = 255; else rt[1] = icol;
00969             icol = (mul * rt[2]) >> 8;
00970             if (icol > 254) rt[2] = 255; else rt[2] = icol;
00971             icol = (mul * rt[3]) >> 8;
00972             if (icol > 254) rt[3] = 255; else rt[3] = icol;
00973             
00974             rt += 4;
00975         }
00976     }
00977     if (rt_float) {
00978         a = ibuf->x * ibuf->y;
00979         while (a--) {
00980             rt_float[0] *= fmul;
00981             rt_float[1] *= fmul;
00982             rt_float[2] *= fmul;
00983             rt_float[3] *= fmul;
00984             
00985             rt_float += 4;
00986         }
00987     }
00988 }
00989 
00990 static float give_stripelem_index(Sequence *seq, float cfra)
00991 {
00992     float nr;
00993     int sta = seq->start;
00994     int end = seq->start + seq->len - 1;
00995 
00996     if (seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) {
00997         end = seq->enddisp;
00998     } 
00999 
01000     if (end < sta) {
01001         return -1;
01002     }
01003 
01004     if (seq->flag & SEQ_REVERSE_FRAMES) {
01005         /*reverse frame in this sequence */
01006         if (cfra <= sta) nr = end - sta;
01007         else if (cfra >= end) nr = 0;
01008         else nr = end - cfra;
01009     }
01010     else {
01011         if (cfra <= sta) nr = 0;
01012         else if (cfra >= end) nr = end - sta;
01013         else nr = cfra - sta;
01014     }
01015     
01016     if (seq->strobe < 1.0f) seq->strobe = 1.0f;
01017     
01018     if (seq->strobe > 1.0f) {
01019         nr -= fmodf((double)nr, (double)seq->strobe);
01020     }
01021 
01022     return nr;
01023 }
01024 
01025 StripElem *give_stripelem(Sequence *seq, int cfra)
01026 {
01027     StripElem *se = seq->strip->stripdata;
01028 
01029     if (seq->type == SEQ_IMAGE) { /* only
01030                                    * IMAGE strips use the whole array,
01031                                    * MOVIE strips use only
01032                                    * the first element, all other strips
01033                                    * don't use this... */
01034         int nr = (int)give_stripelem_index(seq, cfra);
01035 
01036         if (nr == -1 || se == NULL) return NULL;
01037     
01038         se += nr + seq->anim_startofs;
01039     }
01040     return se;
01041 }
01042 
01043 static int evaluate_seq_frame_gen(Sequence **seq_arr, ListBase *seqbase, int cfra)
01044 {
01045     Sequence *seq;
01046     int totseq = 0;
01047 
01048     memset(seq_arr, 0, sizeof(Sequence *) * (MAXSEQ + 1));
01049 
01050     seq = seqbase->first;
01051     while (seq) {
01052         if (seq->startdisp <= cfra && seq->enddisp > cfra) {
01053             seq_arr[seq->machine] = seq;
01054             totseq++;
01055         }
01056         seq = seq->next;
01057     }
01058 
01059     return totseq;
01060 }
01061 
01062 int evaluate_seq_frame(Scene *scene, int cfra)
01063 {
01064     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
01065     Sequence *seq_arr[MAXSEQ + 1];
01066 
01067     if (ed == NULL) return 0;
01068     return evaluate_seq_frame_gen(seq_arr, ed->seqbasep, cfra);
01069 }
01070 
01071 static int video_seq_is_rendered(Sequence *seq)
01072 {
01073     return (seq && !(seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE) && seq->type != SEQ_SOUND);
01074 }
01075 
01076 static int get_shown_sequences(ListBase *seqbasep, int cfra, int chanshown, Sequence **seq_arr_out)
01077 {
01078     Sequence *seq_arr[MAXSEQ + 1];
01079     int b = chanshown;
01080     int cnt = 0;
01081 
01082     if (b > MAXSEQ) {
01083         return 0;
01084     }
01085 
01086     if (evaluate_seq_frame_gen(seq_arr, seqbasep, cfra)) {
01087         if (b == 0) {
01088             b = MAXSEQ;
01089         }
01090         for (; b > 0; b--) {
01091             if (video_seq_is_rendered(seq_arr[b])) {
01092                 break;
01093             }
01094         }
01095     }
01096     
01097     chanshown = b;
01098 
01099     for (; b > 0; b--) {
01100         if (video_seq_is_rendered(seq_arr[b])) {
01101             if (seq_arr[b]->blend_mode == SEQ_BLEND_REPLACE) {
01102                 break;
01103             }
01104         }
01105     }
01106 
01107     for (; b <= chanshown && b >= 0; b++) {
01108         if (video_seq_is_rendered(seq_arr[b])) {
01109             seq_arr_out[cnt++] = seq_arr[b];
01110         }
01111     }
01112 
01113     return cnt;
01114 }
01115 
01116 
01117 /* **********************************************************************
01118  * proxy management
01119  * ********************************************************************** */
01120 
01121 typedef struct SeqIndexBuildContext {
01122     struct IndexBuildContext *index_context;
01123 
01124     int tc_flags;
01125     int size_flags;
01126     int quality;
01127 
01128     Main *bmain;
01129     Scene *scene;
01130     Sequence *seq, *orig_seq;
01131 } SeqIndexBuildContext;
01132 
01133 #define PROXY_MAXFILE (2 * FILE_MAXDIR + FILE_MAXFILE)
01134 
01135 static IMB_Proxy_Size seq_rendersize_to_proxysize(int size)
01136 {
01137     if (size >= 100) {
01138         return IMB_PROXY_NONE;
01139     }
01140     if (size >= 99) {
01141         return IMB_PROXY_100;
01142     }
01143     if (size >= 75) {
01144         return IMB_PROXY_75;
01145     }
01146     if (size >= 50) {
01147         return IMB_PROXY_50;
01148     }
01149     return IMB_PROXY_25;
01150 }
01151 
01152 static double seq_rendersize_to_scale_factor(int size)
01153 {
01154     if (size >= 99) {
01155         return 1.0;
01156     }
01157     if (size >= 75) {
01158         return 0.75;
01159     }
01160     if (size >= 50) {
01161         return 0.50;
01162     }
01163     return 0.25;
01164 }
01165 
01166 static void seq_open_anim_file(Sequence *seq)
01167 {
01168     char name[FILE_MAX];
01169     StripProxy *proxy;
01170 
01171     if (seq->anim != NULL) {
01172         return;
01173     }
01174 
01175     BLI_join_dirfile(name, sizeof(name),
01176                      seq->strip->dir, seq->strip->stripdata->name);
01177     BLI_path_abs(name, G.main->name);
01178     
01179     seq->anim = openanim(name, IB_rect |
01180                          ((seq->flag & SEQ_FILTERY) ?
01181                           IB_animdeinterlace : 0), seq->streamindex);
01182 
01183     if (seq->anim == NULL) {
01184         return;
01185     }
01186 
01187     proxy = seq->strip->proxy;
01188 
01189     if (proxy == NULL) {
01190         return;
01191     }
01192 
01193     if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_PROXY_CUSTOM_DIR) {
01194         IMB_anim_set_index_dir(seq->anim, seq->strip->proxy->dir);
01195     }
01196 }
01197 
01198 
01199 static int seq_proxy_get_fname(Sequence *seq, int cfra, int render_size, char *name)
01200 {
01201     int frameno;
01202     char dir[PROXY_MAXFILE];
01203 
01204     if (!seq->strip->proxy) {
01205         return FALSE;
01206     }
01207 
01208     /* MOVIE tracks (only exception: custom files) are now handled 
01209      * internally by ImBuf module for various reasons: proper time code
01210      * support, quicker index build, using one file instead
01211      * of a full directory of jpeg files, etc. Trying to support old
01212      * and new method at once could lead to funny effects, if people
01213      * have both, a directory full of jpeg files and proxy avis, so
01214      * sorry folks, please rebuild your proxies... */
01215 
01216     if (seq->flag & (SEQ_USE_PROXY_CUSTOM_DIR | SEQ_USE_PROXY_CUSTOM_FILE)) {
01217         BLI_strncpy(dir, seq->strip->proxy->dir, sizeof(dir));
01218     }
01219     else if (seq->type == SEQ_IMAGE) {
01220         BLI_snprintf(dir, PROXY_MAXFILE, "%s/BL_proxy", seq->strip->dir);
01221     }
01222     else {
01223         return FALSE;
01224     }
01225 
01226     if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_PROXY_CUSTOM_FILE) {
01227         BLI_join_dirfile(name, PROXY_MAXFILE,
01228                          dir, seq->strip->proxy->file);
01229         BLI_path_abs(name, G.main->name);
01230 
01231         return TRUE;
01232     }
01233 
01234     /* generate a separate proxy directory for each preview size */
01235 
01236     if (seq->type == SEQ_IMAGE) {
01237         BLI_snprintf(name, PROXY_MAXFILE, "%s/images/%d/%s_proxy", dir,
01238                      render_size,
01239                      give_stripelem(seq, cfra)->name);
01240         frameno = 1;
01241     }
01242     else {
01243         frameno = (int)give_stripelem_index(seq, cfra) + seq->anim_startofs;
01244         BLI_snprintf(name, PROXY_MAXFILE, "%s/proxy_misc/%d/####", dir, 
01245                      render_size);
01246     }
01247 
01248     BLI_path_abs(name, G.main->name);
01249     BLI_path_frame(name, frameno, 0);
01250 
01251     strcat(name, ".jpg");
01252 
01253     return TRUE;
01254 }
01255 
01256 static ImBuf *seq_proxy_fetch(SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq, int cfra)
01257 {
01258     char name[PROXY_MAXFILE];
01259     IMB_Proxy_Size psize = seq_rendersize_to_proxysize(context.preview_render_size);
01260     int size_flags;
01261     int render_size = context.preview_render_size;
01262 
01263     /* dirty hack to distinguish 100% render size from PROXY_100 */
01264     if (render_size == 99) {
01265         render_size = 100;
01266     }
01267 
01268     if (!(seq->flag & SEQ_USE_PROXY)) {
01269         return NULL;
01270     }
01271 
01272     size_flags = seq->strip->proxy->build_size_flags;
01273 
01274     /* only use proxies, if they are enabled (even if present!) */
01275     if (psize == IMB_PROXY_NONE || ((size_flags & psize) != psize)) {
01276         return NULL;
01277     }
01278 
01279     if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_PROXY_CUSTOM_FILE) {
01280         int frameno = (int)give_stripelem_index(seq, cfra) + seq->anim_startofs;
01281         if (seq->strip->proxy->anim == NULL) {
01282             if (seq_proxy_get_fname(seq, cfra, render_size, name) == 0) {
01283                 return NULL;
01284             }
01285  
01286             seq->strip->proxy->anim = openanim(name, IB_rect, 0);
01287         }
01288         if (seq->strip->proxy->anim == NULL) {
01289             return NULL;
01290         }
01291  
01292         seq_open_anim_file(seq);
01293 
01294         frameno = IMB_anim_index_get_frame_index(seq->anim, seq->strip->proxy->tc,
01295                                                  frameno);
01296 
01297         return IMB_anim_absolute(seq->strip->proxy->anim, frameno,
01298                                  IMB_TC_NONE, IMB_PROXY_NONE);
01299     }
01300  
01301     if (seq_proxy_get_fname(seq, cfra, render_size, name) == 0) {
01302         return NULL;
01303     }
01304 
01305     if (BLI_exists(name)) {
01306         return IMB_loadiffname(name, IB_rect);
01307     }
01308     else {
01309         return NULL;
01310     }
01311 }
01312 
01313 static void seq_proxy_build_frame(SeqRenderData context,
01314                                   Sequence *seq, int cfra,
01315                                   int proxy_render_size)
01316 {
01317     char name[PROXY_MAXFILE];
01318     int quality;
01319     int rectx, recty;
01320     int ok;
01321     ImBuf *ibuf;
01322 
01323     if (!seq_proxy_get_fname(seq, cfra, proxy_render_size, name)) {
01324         return;
01325     }
01326 
01327     ibuf = seq_render_strip(context, seq, cfra);
01328 
01329     rectx = (proxy_render_size * context.scene->r.xsch) / 100;
01330     recty = (proxy_render_size * context.scene->r.ysch) / 100;
01331 
01332     if (ibuf->x != rectx || ibuf->y != recty) {
01333         IMB_scalefastImBuf(ibuf, (short)rectx, (short)recty);
01334     }
01335 
01336     /* depth = 32 is intentionally left in, otherwise ALPHA channels
01337      * won't work... */
01338     quality = seq->strip->proxy->quality;
01339     ibuf->ftype = JPG | quality;
01340 
01341     /* unsupported feature only confuses other s/w */
01342     if (ibuf->planes == 32)
01343         ibuf->planes = 24;
01344 
01345     BLI_make_existing_file(name);
01346     
01347     ok = IMB_saveiff(ibuf, name, IB_rect | IB_zbuf | IB_zbuffloat);
01348     if (ok == 0) {
01349         perror(name);
01350     }
01351 
01352     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01353 }
01354 
01355 struct SeqIndexBuildContext *seq_proxy_rebuild_context(Main *bmain, Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
01356 {
01357     SeqIndexBuildContext *context;
01358     Sequence *nseq;
01359 
01360     if (!seq->strip || !seq->strip->proxy) {
01361         return NULL;
01362     }
01363 
01364     if (!(seq->flag & SEQ_USE_PROXY)) {
01365         return NULL;
01366     }
01367 
01368     context = MEM_callocN(sizeof(SeqIndexBuildContext), "seq proxy rebuild context");
01369 
01370     nseq = seq_dupli_recursive(scene, scene, seq, 0);
01371 
01372     context->tc_flags   = nseq->strip->proxy->build_tc_flags;
01373     context->size_flags = nseq->strip->proxy->build_size_flags;
01374     context->quality    = nseq->strip->proxy->quality;
01375 
01376     context->bmain = bmain;
01377     context->scene = scene;
01378     context->orig_seq = seq;
01379     context->seq = nseq;
01380 
01381     if (nseq->type == SEQ_MOVIE) {
01382         seq_open_anim_file(nseq);
01383 
01384         if (nseq->anim) {
01385             context->index_context = IMB_anim_index_rebuild_context(nseq->anim,
01386                     context->tc_flags, context->size_flags, context->quality);
01387         }
01388     }
01389 
01390     return context;
01391 }
01392 
01393 void seq_proxy_rebuild(SeqIndexBuildContext *context, short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
01394 {
01395     SeqRenderData render_context;
01396     Sequence *seq = context->seq;
01397     Scene *scene = context->scene;
01398     int cfra;
01399 
01400     if (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIE) {
01401         if (context->index_context) {
01402             IMB_anim_index_rebuild(context->index_context, stop, do_update, progress);
01403         }
01404 
01405         return;
01406     }
01407 
01408     if (!(seq->flag & SEQ_USE_PROXY)) {
01409         return;
01410     }
01411 
01412     /* that's why it is called custom... */
01413     if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_PROXY_CUSTOM_FILE) {
01414         return;
01415     }
01416 
01417     /* fail safe code */
01418 
01419     render_context = seq_new_render_data(
01420             context->bmain, context->scene,
01421             (scene->r.size * (float)scene->r.xsch) / 100.0f + 0.5f,
01422             (scene->r.size * (float)scene->r.ysch) / 100.0f + 0.5f,
01423             100);
01424 
01425     for (cfra = seq->startdisp + seq->startstill; 
01426          cfra < seq->enddisp - seq->endstill; cfra++) {
01427         if (context->size_flags & IMB_PROXY_25) {
01428             seq_proxy_build_frame(render_context, seq, cfra, 25);
01429         }
01430         if (context->size_flags & IMB_PROXY_50) {
01431             seq_proxy_build_frame(render_context, seq, cfra, 50);
01432         }
01433         if (context->size_flags & IMB_PROXY_75) {
01434             seq_proxy_build_frame(render_context, seq, cfra, 75);
01435         }
01436         if (context->size_flags & IMB_PROXY_100) {
01437             seq_proxy_build_frame(render_context, seq, cfra, 100);
01438         }
01439 
01440         *progress = (float)cfra / (seq->enddisp - seq->endstill -
01441                                    seq->startdisp + seq->startstill);
01442         *do_update = 1;
01443 
01444         if (*stop || G.afbreek)
01445             break;
01446     }
01447 }
01448 
01449 void seq_proxy_rebuild_finish(SeqIndexBuildContext *context, short stop)
01450 {
01451     if (context->index_context) {
01452         IMB_close_anim_proxies(context->seq->anim);
01453         IMB_close_anim_proxies(context->orig_seq->anim);
01454         IMB_anim_index_rebuild_finish(context->index_context, stop);
01455     }
01456 
01457     seq_free_sequence_recurse(context->scene, context->seq);
01458 
01459     MEM_freeN(context);
01460 }
01461 
01462 /* **********************************************************************
01463  * color balance
01464  * ********************************************************************** */
01465 
01466 static StripColorBalance calc_cb(StripColorBalance *cb_)
01467 {
01468     StripColorBalance cb = *cb_;
01469     int c;
01470 
01471     for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) {
01472         cb.lift[c] = 2.0f - cb.lift[c];
01473     }
01474 
01475     if (cb.flag & SEQ_COLOR_BALANCE_INVERSE_LIFT) {
01476         for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) {
01477             /* tweak to give more subtle results
01478              * values above 1.0 are scaled */
01479             if (cb.lift[c] > 1.0f)
01480                 cb.lift[c] = pow(cb.lift[c] - 1.0f, 2.0) + 1.0;
01481 
01482             cb.lift[c] = 2.0f - cb.lift[c];
01483         }
01484     }
01485 
01486     if (cb.flag & SEQ_COLOR_BALANCE_INVERSE_GAIN) {
01487         for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) {
01488             if (cb.gain[c] != 0.0f) {
01489                 cb.gain[c] = 1.0f / cb.gain[c];
01490             }
01491             else {
01492                 cb.gain[c] = 1000000; /* should be enough :) */
01493             }
01494         }
01495     }
01496 
01497     if (!(cb.flag & SEQ_COLOR_BALANCE_INVERSE_GAMMA)) {
01498         for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) {
01499             if (cb.gamma[c] != 0.0f) {
01500                 cb.gamma[c] = 1.0f / cb.gamma[c];
01501             }
01502             else {
01503                 cb.gamma[c] = 1000000; /* should be enough :) */
01504             }
01505         }
01506     }
01507 
01508     return cb;
01509 }
01510 
01511 /* note: lift is actually 2-lift */
01512 MINLINE float color_balance_fl(float in, const float lift, const float gain, const float gamma, const float mul)
01513 {
01514     float x = (((in - 1.0f) * lift) + 1.0f) * gain;
01515 
01516     /* prevent NaN */
01517     if (x < 0.f) x = 0.f;
01518 
01519     return powf(x, gamma) * mul;
01520 }
01521 
01522 static void make_cb_table_byte(float lift, float gain, float gamma,
01523                                unsigned char *table, float mul)
01524 {
01525     int y;
01526 
01527     for (y = 0; y < 256; y++) {
01528         float v = color_balance_fl((float)y * (1.0f / 255.0f), lift, gain, gamma, mul);
01529         CLAMP(v, 0.0f, 1.0f);
01530         table[y] = v * 255;
01531     }
01532 }
01533 
01534 static void make_cb_table_float(float lift, float gain, float gamma,
01535                                 float *table, float mul)
01536 {
01537     int y;
01538 
01539     for (y = 0; y < 256; y++) {
01540         float v = color_balance_fl((float)y * (1.0f / 255.0f), lift, gain, gamma, mul);
01541         table[y] = v;
01542     }
01543 }
01544 
01545 static void color_balance_byte_byte(Sequence *seq, ImBuf *ibuf, float mul)
01546 {
01547     unsigned char cb_tab[3][256];
01548     int c;
01549     unsigned char *p = (unsigned char *) ibuf->rect;
01550     unsigned char *e = p + ibuf->x * 4 * ibuf->y;
01551 
01552     StripColorBalance cb = calc_cb(seq->strip->color_balance);
01553 
01554     for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) {
01555         make_cb_table_byte(cb.lift[c], cb.gain[c], cb.gamma[c],
01556                            cb_tab[c], mul);
01557     }
01558 
01559     while (p < e) {
01560         p[0] = cb_tab[0][p[0]];
01561         p[1] = cb_tab[1][p[1]];
01562         p[2] = cb_tab[2][p[2]];
01563         
01564         p += 4;
01565     }
01566 }
01567 
01568 static void color_balance_byte_float(Sequence *seq, ImBuf *ibuf, float mul)
01569 {
01570     float cb_tab[4][256];
01571     int c, i;
01572     unsigned char *p = (unsigned char *) ibuf->rect;
01573     unsigned char *e = p + ibuf->x * 4 * ibuf->y;
01574     float *o;
01575     StripColorBalance cb;
01576 
01577     imb_addrectfloatImBuf(ibuf);
01578 
01579     o = ibuf->rect_float;
01580 
01581     cb = calc_cb(seq->strip->color_balance);
01582 
01583     for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) {
01584         make_cb_table_float(cb.lift[c], cb.gain[c], cb.gamma[c], cb_tab[c], mul);
01585     }
01586 
01587     for (i = 0; i < 256; i++) {
01588         cb_tab[3][i] = ((float)i) * (1.0f / 255.0f);
01589     }
01590 
01591     while (p < e) {
01592         o[0] = cb_tab[0][p[0]];
01593         o[1] = cb_tab[1][p[1]];
01594         o[2] = cb_tab[2][p[2]];
01595         o[3] = cb_tab[3][p[3]];
01596 
01597         p += 4; o += 4;
01598     }
01599 }
01600 
01601 static void color_balance_float_float(Sequence *seq, ImBuf *ibuf, float mul)
01602 {
01603     float *p = ibuf->rect_float;
01604     float *e = ibuf->rect_float + ibuf->x * 4 * ibuf->y;
01605     StripColorBalance cb = calc_cb(seq->strip->color_balance);
01606 
01607     while (p < e) {
01608         int c;
01609         for (c = 0; c < 3; c++) {
01610             p[c] = color_balance_fl(p[c], cb.lift[c], cb.gain[c], cb.gamma[c], mul);
01611         }
01612         p += 4;
01613     }
01614 }
01615 
01616 static void color_balance(Sequence *seq, ImBuf *ibuf, float mul)
01617 {
01618     if (ibuf->rect_float) {
01619         color_balance_float_float(seq, ibuf, mul);
01620     }
01621     else if (seq->flag & SEQ_MAKE_FLOAT) {
01622         color_balance_byte_float(seq, ibuf, mul);
01623     }
01624     else {
01625         color_balance_byte_byte(seq, ibuf, mul);
01626     }
01627 }
01628 
01629 /*
01630  *  input preprocessing for SEQ_IMAGE, SEQ_MOVIE, SEQ_MOVIECLIP and SEQ_SCENE
01631  *
01632  *  Do all the things you can't really do afterwards using sequence effects
01633  *  (read: before rescaling to render resolution has been done)
01634  *
01635  *  Order is important!
01636  *
01637  *  - Deinterlace
01638  *  - Crop and transform in image source coordinate space
01639  *  - Flip X + Flip Y (could be done afterwards, backward compatibility)
01640  *  - Promote image to float data (affects pipeline operations afterwards)
01641  *  - Color balance (is most efficient in the byte -> float
01642  *    (future: half -> float should also work fine!)
01643  *    case, if done on load, since we can use lookup tables)
01644  *  - Premultiply
01645  */
01646 
01647 int input_have_to_preprocess(
01648         SeqRenderData UNUSED(context), Sequence *seq, float UNUSED(cfra))
01649 {
01650     float mul;
01651 
01652     if (seq->flag & (SEQ_FILTERY | SEQ_USE_CROP | SEQ_USE_TRANSFORM | SEQ_FLIPX |
01653                      SEQ_FLIPY | SEQ_USE_COLOR_BALANCE | SEQ_MAKE_PREMUL)) {
01654         return TRUE;
01655     }
01656 
01657     mul = seq->mul;
01658 
01659     if (seq->blend_mode == SEQ_BLEND_REPLACE) {
01660         mul *= seq->blend_opacity / 100.0f;
01661     }
01662 
01663     if (mul != 1.0f) {
01664         return TRUE;
01665     }
01666 
01667     if (seq->sat != 1.0f) {
01668         return TRUE;
01669     }
01670         
01671     return FALSE;
01672 }
01673 
01674 static ImBuf *input_preprocess(
01675         SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq, float UNUSED(cfra), ImBuf *ibuf,
01676         int is_proxy_image, int is_preprocessed)
01677 {
01678     float mul;
01679 
01680     ibuf = IMB_makeSingleUser(ibuf);
01681 
01682     if ((seq->flag & SEQ_FILTERY) &&
01683         !ELEM(seq->type, SEQ_MOVIE, SEQ_MOVIECLIP))
01684     {
01685         IMB_filtery(ibuf);
01686     }
01687 
01688     if (seq->flag & (SEQ_USE_CROP | SEQ_USE_TRANSFORM)) {
01689         StripCrop c = {0};
01690         StripTransform t = {0};
01691         int sx, sy, dx, dy;
01692         double xscale = 1.0;
01693         double yscale = 1.0;
01694 
01695         if (is_proxy_image) {
01696             double f = seq_rendersize_to_scale_factor(
01697                     context.preview_render_size);
01698 
01699             if (f != 1.0) {
01700                 IMB_scalefastImBuf(
01701                         ibuf, ibuf->x / f, ibuf->y / f);
01702             }
01703         }
01704 
01705         if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_CROP && seq->strip->crop) {
01706             c = *seq->strip->crop;
01707         }
01708         if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_TRANSFORM && seq->strip->transform) {
01709             t = *seq->strip->transform;
01710         }
01711 
01712         xscale = context.scene->r.xsch ? 
01713                  ((double) context.rectx /
01714                   (double) context.scene->r.xsch) : 1.0;
01715         yscale = context.scene->r.ysch ? 
01716                  ((double) context.recty /
01717                   (double) context.scene->r.ysch) : 1.0;
01718 
01719         c.left *= xscale; c.right *= xscale;
01720         c.top *= yscale; c.bottom *= yscale;
01721 
01722         t.xofs *= xscale; t.yofs *= yscale;
01723 
01724         sx = ibuf->x - c.left - c.right;
01725         sy = ibuf->y - c.top - c.bottom;
01726         dx = sx;
01727         dy = sy;
01728 
01729         if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_TRANSFORM) {
01730             if (is_preprocessed) {
01731                 dx = context.rectx;
01732                 dy = context.recty;
01733             }
01734             else {
01735                 dx = context.scene->r.xsch;
01736                 dy = context.scene->r.ysch;
01737             }
01738         }
01739 
01740         if (c.top + c.bottom >= ibuf->y || c.left + c.right >= ibuf->x ||
01741             t.xofs >= dx || t.yofs >= dy) {
01742             make_black_ibuf(ibuf);
01743         }
01744         else {
01745             ImBuf *i = IMB_allocImBuf(
01746                     dx, dy, 32,
01747                     ibuf->rect_float ? IB_rectfloat : IB_rect);
01748 
01749             IMB_rectcpy(i, ibuf, 
01750                         t.xofs, t.yofs, c.left, c.bottom, sx, sy);
01751             
01752             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01753 
01754             ibuf = i;
01755         }
01756     } 
01757 
01758     if (seq->flag & SEQ_FLIPX) {
01759         IMB_flipx(ibuf);
01760     }
01761     
01762     if (seq->flag & SEQ_FLIPY) {
01763         IMB_flipy(ibuf);
01764     }
01765 
01766     if (seq->sat != 1.0f) {
01767         IMB_saturation(ibuf, seq->sat);
01768     }
01769 
01770     mul = seq->mul;
01771 
01772     if (seq->blend_mode == SEQ_BLEND_REPLACE) {
01773         mul *= seq->blend_opacity / 100.0f;
01774     }
01775 
01776     if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_COLOR_BALANCE && seq->strip->color_balance) {
01777         color_balance(seq, ibuf, mul);
01778         mul = 1.0;
01779     }
01780 
01781     if (seq->flag & SEQ_MAKE_FLOAT) {
01782         if (!ibuf->rect_float)
01783             IMB_float_from_rect_simple(ibuf);
01784 
01785         if (ibuf->rect) {
01786             imb_freerectImBuf(ibuf);
01787         }
01788     }
01789 
01790     if (mul != 1.0f) {
01791         multibuf(ibuf, mul);
01792     }
01793 
01794     if (seq->flag & SEQ_MAKE_PREMUL) {
01795         if (ibuf->planes == 32 && ibuf->zbuf == NULL) {
01796             IMB_premultiply_alpha(ibuf);
01797         }
01798     }
01799 
01800 
01801     if (ibuf->x != context.rectx || ibuf->y != context.recty) {
01802         if (context.scene->r.mode & R_OSA) {
01803             IMB_scaleImBuf(ibuf, (short)context.rectx, (short)context.recty);
01804         }
01805         else {
01806             IMB_scalefastImBuf(ibuf, (short)context.rectx, (short)context.recty);
01807         }
01808     }
01809     return ibuf;
01810 }
01811 
01812 static ImBuf *copy_from_ibuf_still(SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq,
01813                                    float nr)
01814 {
01815     ImBuf *rval = NULL;
01816     ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
01817 
01818     if (nr == 0) {
01819         ibuf = seq_stripelem_cache_get(
01820                 context, seq, seq->start,
01821                 SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_STARTSTILL);
01822     }
01823     else if (nr == seq->len - 1) {
01824         ibuf = seq_stripelem_cache_get(
01825                 context, seq, seq->start,
01826                 SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_ENDSTILL);
01827     }
01828 
01829     if (ibuf) {
01830         rval = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
01831         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01832     }
01833 
01834     return rval;
01835 }
01836 
01837 static void copy_to_ibuf_still(SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq, float nr,
01838                                ImBuf *ibuf)
01839 {
01840     if (nr == 0 || nr == seq->len - 1) {
01841         /* we have to store a copy, since the passed ibuf
01842          * could be preprocessed afterwards (thereby silently
01843          * changing the cached image... */
01844         ibuf = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
01845 
01846         if (nr == 0) {
01847             seq_stripelem_cache_put(
01848                     context, seq, seq->start,
01849                     SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_STARTSTILL, ibuf);
01850         } 
01851 
01852         if (nr == seq->len - 1) {
01853             seq_stripelem_cache_put(
01854                     context, seq, seq->start,
01855                     SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_ENDSTILL, ibuf);
01856         }
01857 
01858         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01859     }
01860 }
01861 
01862 /* **********************************************************************
01863  * strip rendering functions
01864  * ********************************************************************** */
01865 
01866 static ImBuf *seq_render_strip_stack(
01867         SeqRenderData context, ListBase *seqbasep, float cfra, int chanshown);
01868 
01869 static ImBuf *seq_render_strip(
01870         SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq, float cfra);
01871 
01872 
01873 static ImBuf *seq_render_effect_strip_impl(
01874         SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq, float cfra)
01875 {
01876     float fac, facf;
01877     int early_out;
01878     int i;
01879     struct SeqEffectHandle sh = get_sequence_effect(seq);
01880     FCurve *fcu = NULL;
01881     ImBuf *ibuf[3];
01882     Sequence *input[3];
01883     ImBuf *out = NULL;
01884 
01885     ibuf[0] = ibuf[1] = ibuf[2] = NULL;
01886 
01887     input[0] = seq->seq1; input[1] = seq->seq2; input[2] = seq->seq3;
01888 
01889     if (!sh.execute) { /* effect not supported in this version... */
01890         out = IMB_allocImBuf((short)context.rectx, 
01891                              (short)context.recty, 32, IB_rect);
01892         return out;
01893     }
01894 
01895     if (seq->flag & SEQ_USE_EFFECT_DEFAULT_FADE) {
01896         sh.get_default_fac(seq, cfra, &fac, &facf);
01897         
01898         if ((context.scene->r.mode & R_FIELDS) == 0)
01899             facf = fac;
01900     }
01901     else {
01902         fcu = id_data_find_fcurve(&context.scene->id, seq, &RNA_Sequence, "effect_fader", 0, NULL);
01903         if (fcu) {
01904             fac = facf = evaluate_fcurve(fcu, cfra);
01905             if (context.scene->r.mode & R_FIELDS) {
01906                 facf = evaluate_fcurve(fcu, cfra + 0.5f);
01907             }
01908         }
01909         else {
01910             fac = facf = seq->effect_fader;
01911         }
01912     }
01913 
01914     early_out = sh.early_out(seq, fac, facf);
01915 
01916     switch (early_out) {
01917         case EARLY_NO_INPUT:
01918             out = sh.execute(context, seq, cfra, fac, facf,  
01919                              NULL, NULL, NULL);
01920             break;
01921         case EARLY_DO_EFFECT:
01922             for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
01923                 if (input[i])
01924                     ibuf[i] = seq_render_strip(
01925                             context, input[i], cfra);
01926             }
01927 
01928             if (ibuf[0] && ibuf[1]) {
01929                 out = sh.execute(context, seq, cfra, fac, facf,
01930                                  ibuf[0], ibuf[1], ibuf[2]);
01931             }
01932             break;
01933         case EARLY_USE_INPUT_1:
01934             if (input[0]) {
01935                 ibuf[0] = seq_render_strip(context, input[0], cfra);
01936             }
01937             if (ibuf[0]) {
01938                 if (input_have_to_preprocess(context, seq, cfra)) {
01939                     out = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf[0]);
01940                 }
01941                 else {
01942                     out = ibuf[0];
01943                     IMB_refImBuf(out);
01944                 }
01945             }
01946             break;
01947         case EARLY_USE_INPUT_2:
01948             if (input[1]) {
01949                 ibuf[1] = seq_render_strip(context, input[1], cfra);
01950             }
01951             if (ibuf[1]) {
01952                 if (input_have_to_preprocess(context, seq, cfra)) {
01953                     out = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf[1]);
01954                 }
01955                 else {
01956                     out = ibuf[1];
01957                     IMB_refImBuf(out);
01958                 }
01959             }
01960             break;
01961     }
01962 
01963     for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
01964         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf[i]);
01965     }
01966 
01967     if (out == NULL) {
01968         out = IMB_allocImBuf((short)context.rectx, (short)context.recty, 32, IB_rect);
01969     }
01970 
01971     return out;
01972 }
01973 
01974 static ImBuf *seq_render_movieclip_strip(
01975         SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq, float nr)
01976 {
01977     ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
01978     MovieClipUser user;
01979     float tloc[2], tscale, tangle;
01980 
01981     if (!seq->clip) {
01982         return NULL;
01983     }
01984 
01985     memset(&user, 0, sizeof(MovieClipUser));
01986     
01987     BKE_movieclip_user_set_frame(&user, nr + seq->anim_startofs);
01988 
01989     user.render_size = MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_FULL;
01990 
01991     switch (seq_rendersize_to_proxysize(context.preview_render_size)) {
01992         case IMB_PROXY_NONE:
01993             user.render_size = MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_FULL;
01994             break;
01995         case IMB_PROXY_100:
01996             user.render_size = MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_100;
01997             break;
01998         case IMB_PROXY_75:
01999             user.render_size = MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_75;
02000             break;
02001         case IMB_PROXY_50:
02002             user.render_size = MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_50;
02003             break;
02004         case IMB_PROXY_25:
02005             user.render_size = MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_SIZE_25;
02006             break;
02007     }
02008 
02009     if (seq->clip_flag & SEQ_MOVIECLIP_RENDER_UNDISTORTED) {
02010         user.render_flag = MCLIP_PROXY_RENDER_UNDISTORT;
02011     }
02012 
02013     if (seq->clip_flag & SEQ_MOVIECLIP_RENDER_STABILIZED) {
02014         ibuf = BKE_movieclip_get_stable_ibuf(
02015                 seq->clip, &user, tloc, &tscale, &tangle,
02016                 0);
02017     }
02018     else {
02019         ibuf = BKE_movieclip_get_ibuf_flag(
02020                 seq->clip, &user, 0, MOVIECLIP_CACHE_SKIP);
02021     }
02022 
02023     return ibuf;
02024 }
02025 
02026 static ImBuf *seq_render_scene_strip(
02027         SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq, float nr)
02028 {
02029     ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
02030     float frame;
02031     float oldcfra;
02032     Object *camera;
02033     ListBase oldmarkers;
02034     
02035     /* Old info:
02036      * Hack! This function can be called from do_render_seq(), in that case
02037      * the seq->scene can already have a Render initialized with same name,
02038      * so we have to use a default name. (compositor uses scene name to
02039      * find render).
02040      * However, when called from within the UI (image preview in sequencer)
02041      * we do want to use scene Render, that way the render result is defined
02042      * for display in render/imagewindow
02043      *
02044      * Hmm, don't see, why we can't do that all the time,
02045      * and since G.rendering is uhm, gone... (Peter)
02046      */
02047 
02048     /* New info:
02049      * Using the same name for the renders works just fine as the do_render_seq()
02050      * render is not used while the scene strips are rendered.
02051      *
02052      * However rendering from UI (through sequencer_preview_area_draw) can crash in
02053      * very many cases since other renders (material preview, an actual render etc.)
02054      * can be started while this sequence preview render is running. The only proper
02055      * solution is to make the sequencer preview render a proper job, which can be
02056      * stopped when needed. This would also give a nice progress bar for the preview
02057      * space so that users know there's something happening.
02058      *
02059      * As a result the active scene now only uses OpenGL rendering for the sequencer
02060      * preview. This is far from nice, but is the only way to prevent crashes at this
02061      * time.
02062      *
02063      * -jahka
02064      */
02065 
02066     int rendering = G.rendering;
02067     int doseq;
02068     int doseq_gl = G.rendering ? /*(scene->r.seq_flag & R_SEQ_GL_REND)*/ 0 : /*(scene->r.seq_flag & R_SEQ_GL_PREV)*/ 1;
02069     int have_seq = FALSE;
02070     Scene *scene;
02071 
02072     /* don't refer to seq->scene above this point!, it can be NULL */
02073     if (seq->scene == NULL) {
02074         return NULL;
02075     }
02076 
02077     scene = seq->scene;
02078     frame = scene->r.sfra + nr + seq->anim_startofs;
02079 
02080     have_seq = (scene->r.scemode & R_DOSEQ) && scene->ed && scene->ed->seqbase.first;
02081 
02082     oldcfra = scene->r.cfra;
02083     scene->r.cfra = frame;
02084 
02085     if (seq->scene_camera)  
02086         camera = seq->scene_camera;
02087     else {  
02088         scene_camera_switch_update(scene);
02089         camera = scene->camera;
02090     }
02091 
02092     if (have_seq == FALSE && camera == NULL) {
02093         scene->r.cfra = oldcfra;
02094         return NULL;
02095     }
02096 
02097     /* prevent eternal loop */
02098     doseq = context.scene->r.scemode & R_DOSEQ;
02099     context.scene->r.scemode &= ~R_DOSEQ;
02100     
02101 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
02102     /* stooping to new low's in hackyness :( */
02103     oldmarkers = scene->markers;
02104     scene->markers.first = scene->markers.last = NULL;
02105 #else
02106     (void)oldmarkers;
02107 #endif
02108     
02109     if (sequencer_view3d_cb && BLI_thread_is_main() && doseq_gl && (scene == context.scene || have_seq == 0) && camera) {
02110         char err_out[256] = "unknown";
02111         /* for old scened this can be uninitialized, should probably be added to do_versions at some point if the functionality stays */
02112         if (context.scene->r.seq_prev_type == 0)
02113             context.scene->r.seq_prev_type = 3 /* ==OB_SOLID */; 
02114 
02115         /* opengl offscreen render */
02116         scene_update_for_newframe(context.bmain, scene, scene->lay);
02117         ibuf = sequencer_view3d_cb(scene, camera, context.rectx, context.recty,
02118                                    IB_rect, context.scene->r.seq_prev_type, TRUE, err_out);
02119         if (ibuf == NULL) {
02120             fprintf(stderr, "seq_render_scene_strip failed to get opengl buffer: %s\n", err_out);
02121         }
02122     }
02123     else {
02124         Render *re = RE_GetRender(scene->id.name);
02125         RenderResult rres;
02126 
02127         /* XXX: this if can be removed when sequence preview rendering uses the job system */
02128         if (rendering || context.scene != scene) {
02129             if (re == NULL)
02130                 re = RE_NewRender(scene->id.name);
02131             
02132             RE_BlenderFrame(re, context.bmain, scene, NULL, camera, scene->lay, frame, FALSE);
02133 
02134             /* restore previous state after it was toggled on & off by RE_BlenderFrame */
02135             G.rendering = rendering;
02136         }
02137         
02138         RE_AcquireResultImage(re, &rres);
02139         
02140         if (rres.rectf) {
02141             ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(rres.rectx, rres.recty, 32, IB_rectfloat);
02142             memcpy(ibuf->rect_float, rres.rectf, 4 * sizeof(float) * rres.rectx * rres.recty);
02143             if (rres.rectz) {
02144                 addzbuffloatImBuf(ibuf);
02145                 memcpy(ibuf->zbuf_float, rres.rectz, sizeof(float) * rres.rectx * rres.recty);
02146             }
02147 
02148             /* float buffers in the sequencer are not linear */
02149             if (scene->r.color_mgt_flag & R_COLOR_MANAGEMENT)
02150                 ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB;
02151             else
02152                 ibuf->profile = IB_PROFILE_NONE;
02153             IMB_convert_profile(ibuf, IB_PROFILE_SRGB);         
02154         }
02155         else if (rres.rect32) {
02156             ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf(rres.rectx, rres.recty, 32, IB_rect);
02157             memcpy(ibuf->rect, rres.rect32, 4 * rres.rectx * rres.recty);
02158         }
02159         
02160         RE_ReleaseResultImage(re);
02161         
02162         // BIF_end_render_callbacks();
02163     }
02164     
02165     /* restore */
02166     context.scene->r.scemode |= doseq;
02167     
02168     scene->r.cfra = oldcfra;
02169 
02170     if (frame != oldcfra)
02171         scene_update_for_newframe(context.bmain, scene, scene->lay);
02172     
02173 #ifdef DURIAN_CAMERA_SWITCH
02174     /* stooping to new low's in hackyness :( */
02175     scene->markers = oldmarkers;
02176 #endif
02177 
02178     return ibuf;
02179 }
02180 
02181 static ImBuf *seq_render_strip(SeqRenderData context, Sequence *seq, float cfra)
02182 {
02183     ImBuf *ibuf = NULL;
02184     char name[FILE_MAX];
02185     int use_preprocess = input_have_to_preprocess(context, seq, cfra);
02186     int is_proxy_image = FALSE;
02187     float nr = give_stripelem_index(seq, cfra);
02188     /* all effects are handled similarly with the exception of speed effect */
02189     int type = (seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT && seq->type != SEQ_SPEED) ? SEQ_EFFECT : seq->type;
02190     int is_preprocessed = !ELEM3(type, SEQ_IMAGE, SEQ_MOVIE, SEQ_SCENE);
02191 
02192     ibuf = seq_stripelem_cache_get(context, seq, cfra, SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF);
02193 
02194     /* currently, we cache preprocessed images in SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF,
02195      * but not(!) on SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_ENDSTILL and ..._STARTSTILL */
02196     if (ibuf)
02197         use_preprocess = FALSE;
02198 
02199     if (ibuf == NULL)
02200         ibuf = copy_from_ibuf_still(context, seq, nr);
02201     
02202     /* MOVIECLIPs have their own proxy management */
02203     if (ibuf == NULL && seq->type != SEQ_MOVIECLIP) {
02204         ibuf = seq_proxy_fetch(context, seq, cfra);
02205         is_proxy_image = (ibuf != NULL);
02206     }
02207 
02208     if (ibuf == NULL) switch (type) {
02209             case SEQ_META:
02210             {
02211                 ImBuf *meta_ibuf = NULL;
02212 
02213                 if (seq->seqbase.first)
02214                     meta_ibuf = seq_render_strip_stack(
02215                             context, &seq->seqbase,
02216                             seq->start + nr, 0);
02217 
02218                 if (meta_ibuf) {
02219                     ibuf = meta_ibuf;
02220                     if (ibuf && use_preprocess) {
02221                         ImBuf *i = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
02222 
02223                         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
02224 
02225                         ibuf = i;
02226                     }
02227                 }
02228 
02229                 break;
02230             }
02231             case SEQ_SPEED:
02232             {
02233                 ImBuf *child_ibuf = NULL;
02234 
02235                 float f_cfra;
02236                 SpeedControlVars *s = (SpeedControlVars *)seq->effectdata;
02237 
02238                 sequence_effect_speed_rebuild_map(context.scene, seq, 0);
02239 
02240                 /* weeek! */
02241                 f_cfra = seq->start + s->frameMap[(int)nr];
02242 
02243                 child_ibuf = seq_render_strip(context, seq->seq1, f_cfra);
02244 
02245                 if (child_ibuf) {
02246                     ibuf = child_ibuf;
02247                     if (ibuf && use_preprocess) {
02248                         ImBuf *i = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
02249 
02250                         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
02251 
02252                         ibuf = i;
02253                     }
02254                 }
02255                 break;
02256             }
02257             case SEQ_EFFECT:
02258             {
02259                 ibuf = seq_render_effect_strip_impl(
02260                         context, seq, seq->start + nr);
02261                 break;
02262             }
02263             case SEQ_IMAGE:
02264             {
02265                 StripElem *s_elem = give_stripelem(seq, cfra);
02266 
02267                 if (s_elem) {
02268                     BLI_join_dirfile(name, sizeof(name), seq->strip->dir, s_elem->name);
02269                     BLI_path_abs(name, G.main->name);
02270                 }
02271 
02272                 if (s_elem && (ibuf = IMB_loadiffname(name, IB_rect))) {
02273                     /* we don't need both (speed reasons)! */
02274                     if (ibuf->rect_float && ibuf->rect)
02275                         imb_freerectImBuf(ibuf);
02276 
02277                     /* all sequencer color is done in SRGB space, linear gives odd crossfades */
02278                     if (ibuf->profile == IB_PROFILE_LINEAR_RGB)
02279                         IMB_convert_profile(ibuf, IB_PROFILE_NONE);
02280 
02281                     copy_to_ibuf_still(context, seq, nr, ibuf);
02282 
02283                     s_elem->orig_width  = ibuf->x;
02284                     s_elem->orig_height = ibuf->y;
02285                 }
02286                 break;
02287             }
02288             case SEQ_MOVIE:
02289             {
02290                 seq_open_anim_file(seq);
02291 
02292                 if (seq->anim) {
02293                     IMB_anim_set_preseek(seq->anim,
02294                                          seq->anim_preseek);
02295 
02296                     ibuf = IMB_anim_absolute(
02297                             seq->anim, nr + seq->anim_startofs,
02298                             seq->strip->proxy ?
02299                                 seq->strip->proxy->tc :
02300                                 IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN,
02301                             seq_rendersize_to_proxysize(
02302                                 context.preview_render_size));
02303 
02304                     /* we don't need both (speed reasons)! */
02305                     if (ibuf && ibuf->rect_float && ibuf->rect)
02306                         imb_freerectImBuf(ibuf);
02307                     if (ibuf) {
02308                         seq->strip->stripdata->orig_width = ibuf->x;
02309                         seq->strip->stripdata->orig_height = ibuf->y;
02310                     }
02311                 }
02312                 copy_to_ibuf_still(context, seq, nr, ibuf);
02313                 break;
02314             }
02315             case SEQ_SCENE:
02316             { // scene can be NULL after deletions
02317                 ibuf = seq_render_scene_strip(context, seq, nr);
02318 
02319                 /* Scene strips update all animation, so we need to restore original state.*/
02320                 BKE_animsys_evaluate_all_animation(context.bmain, context.scene, cfra);
02321 
02322                 copy_to_ibuf_still(context, seq, nr, ibuf);
02323                 break;
02324             }
02325             case SEQ_MOVIECLIP:
02326             {
02327                 ibuf = seq_render_movieclip_strip(context, seq, nr);
02328 
02329                 if (ibuf && use_preprocess) {
02330                     ImBuf *i = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
02331 
02332                     IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
02333 
02334                     ibuf = i;
02335                 }
02336 
02337                 copy_to_ibuf_still(context, seq, nr, ibuf);
02338                 break;
02339             }
02340         }
02341 
02342     if (ibuf == NULL)
02343         ibuf = IMB_allocImBuf((short)context.rectx, (short)context.recty, 32, IB_rect);
02344 
02345     if (ibuf->x != context.rectx || ibuf->y != context.recty)
02346         use_preprocess = TRUE;
02347 
02348     if (use_preprocess)
02349         ibuf = input_preprocess(context, seq, cfra, ibuf, 
02350                                 is_proxy_image, is_preprocessed);
02351 
02352     seq_stripelem_cache_put(context, seq, cfra, SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF, ibuf);
02353 
02354     return ibuf;
02355 }
02356 
02357 /* **********************************************************************
02358  * strip stack rendering functions
02359  * ********************************************************************** */
02360 
02361 static int seq_must_swap_input_in_blend_mode(Sequence *seq)
02362 {
02363     int swap_input = FALSE;
02364 
02365     /* bad hack, to fix crazy input ordering of 
02366      * those two effects */
02367 
02368     if (ELEM3(seq->blend_mode, SEQ_ALPHAOVER, SEQ_ALPHAUNDER, SEQ_OVERDROP)) {
02369         swap_input = TRUE;
02370     }
02371     
02372     return swap_input;
02373 }
02374 
02375 static int seq_get_early_out_for_blend_mode(Sequence *seq)
02376 {
02377     struct SeqEffectHandle sh = get_sequence_blend(seq);
02378     float facf = seq->blend_opacity / 100.0f;
02379     int early_out = sh.early_out(seq, facf, facf);
02380     
02381     if (ELEM(early_out, EARLY_DO_EFFECT, EARLY_NO_INPUT)) {
02382         return early_out;
02383     }
02384 
02385     if (seq_must_swap_input_in_blend_mode(seq)) {
02386         if (early_out == EARLY_USE_INPUT_2) {
02387             return EARLY_USE_INPUT_1;
02388         }
02389         else if (early_out == EARLY_USE_INPUT_1) {
02390             return EARLY_USE_INPUT_2;
02391         }
02392     }
02393     return early_out;
02394 }
02395 
02396 static ImBuf *seq_render_strip_stack(
02397         SeqRenderData context, ListBase *seqbasep, float cfra, int chanshown)
02398 {
02399     Sequence *seq_arr[MAXSEQ + 1];
02400     int count;
02401     int i;
02402     ImBuf *out = NULL;
02403 
02404     count = get_shown_sequences(seqbasep, cfra, chanshown, (Sequence **)&seq_arr);
02405 
02406     if (count == 0) {
02407         return NULL;
02408     }
02409 
02410 #if 0 /* commentind since this breaks keyframing, since it resets the value on draw */
02411     if (scene->r.cfra != cfra) {
02412         // XXX for prefetch and overlay offset!..., very bad!!!
02413         AnimData *adt = BKE_animdata_from_id(&scene->id);
02414         BKE_animsys_evaluate_animdata(scene, &scene->id, adt, cfra, ADT_RECALC_ANIM);
02415     }
02416 #endif
02417 
02418     out = seq_stripelem_cache_get(context, seq_arr[count - 1], 
02419                                   cfra, SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_COMP);
02420 
02421     if (out) {
02422         return out;
02423     }
02424     
02425     if (count == 1) {
02426         out = seq_render_strip(context, seq_arr[0], cfra);
02427         seq_stripelem_cache_put(context, seq_arr[0], cfra, 
02428                                 SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_COMP, out);
02429 
02430         return out;
02431     }
02432 
02433 
02434     for (i = count - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
02435         int early_out;
02436         Sequence *seq = seq_arr[i];
02437 
02438         out = seq_stripelem_cache_get(
02439                 context, seq, cfra, SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_COMP);
02440 
02441         if (out) {
02442             break;
02443         }
02444         if (seq->blend_mode == SEQ_BLEND_REPLACE) {
02445             out = seq_render_strip(context, seq, cfra);
02446             break;
02447         }
02448 
02449         early_out = seq_get_early_out_for_blend_mode(seq);
02450 
02451         switch (early_out) {
02452             case EARLY_NO_INPUT:
02453             case EARLY_USE_INPUT_2:
02454                 out = seq_render_strip(context, seq, cfra);
02455                 break;
02456             case EARLY_USE_INPUT_1:
