02457                 if (i == 0) {
02458                     out = IMB_allocImBuf((short)context.rectx, (short)context.recty, 32, IB_rect);
02459                 }
02460                 break;
02461             case EARLY_DO_EFFECT:
02462                 if (i == 0) {
02463                     out = seq_render_strip(context, seq, cfra);
02464                 }
02465 
02466                 break;
02467         }
02468         if (out) {
02469             break;
02470         }
02471     }
02472 
02473     seq_stripelem_cache_put(context, seq_arr[i], cfra, 
02474                             SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_COMP, out);
02475 
02476 
02477     i++;
02478 
02479     for (; i < count; i++) {
02480         Sequence *seq = seq_arr[i];
02481 
02482         if (seq_get_early_out_for_blend_mode(seq) == EARLY_DO_EFFECT) {
02483             struct SeqEffectHandle sh = get_sequence_blend(seq);
02484             ImBuf *ibuf1 = out;
02485             ImBuf *ibuf2 = seq_render_strip(context, seq, cfra);
02486 
02487             float facf = seq->blend_opacity / 100.0f;
02488             int swap_input = seq_must_swap_input_in_blend_mode(seq);
02489 
02490             if (swap_input) {
02491                 out = sh.execute(context, seq, cfra, 
02492                                  facf, facf,
02493                                  ibuf2, ibuf1, NULL);
02494             }
02495             else {
02496                 out = sh.execute(context, seq, cfra, 
02497                                  facf, facf,
02498                                  ibuf1, ibuf2, NULL);
02499             }
02500         
02501             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf1);
02502             IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf2);
02503         }
02504 
02505         seq_stripelem_cache_put(context, seq_arr[i], cfra,
02506                                 SEQ_STRIPELEM_IBUF_COMP, out);
02507     }
02508 
02509     return out;
02510 }
02511 
02512 /*
02513  * returned ImBuf is refed!
02514  * you have to free after usage!
02515  */
02516 
02517 ImBuf *give_ibuf_seq(SeqRenderData context, float cfra, int chanshown)
02518 {
02519     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(context.scene, FALSE);
02520     int count;
02521     ListBase *seqbasep;
02522     
02523     if (ed == NULL) return NULL;
02524 
02525     count = BLI_countlist(&ed->metastack);
02526     if ((chanshown < 0) && (count > 0)) {
02527         count = MAX2(count + chanshown, 0);
02528         seqbasep = ((MetaStack *)BLI_findlink(&ed->metastack, count))->oldbasep;
02529     }
02530     else {
02531         seqbasep = ed->seqbasep;
02532     }
02533 
02534     return seq_render_strip_stack(context, seqbasep, cfra, chanshown);
02535 }
02536 
02537 ImBuf *give_ibuf_seqbase(SeqRenderData context, float cfra, int chanshown, ListBase *seqbasep)
02538 {
02539     return seq_render_strip_stack(context, seqbasep, cfra, chanshown);
02540 }
02541 
02542 
02543 ImBuf *give_ibuf_seq_direct(SeqRenderData context, float cfra, Sequence *seq)
02544 {
02545     return seq_render_strip(context, seq, cfra);
02546 }
02547 
02548 #if 0
02549 /* check used when we need to change seq->blend_mode but not to effect or audio strips */
02550 static int seq_can_blend(Sequence *seq)
02551 {
02552     if (ELEM4(seq->type, SEQ_IMAGE, SEQ_META, SEQ_SCENE, SEQ_MOVIE)) {
02553         return 1;
02554     }
02555     else {
02556         return 0;
02557     }
02558 }
02559 #endif
02560 
02561 /* *********************** threading api ******************* */
02562 
02563 static ListBase running_threads;
02564 static ListBase prefetch_wait;
02565 static ListBase prefetch_done;
02566 
02567 static pthread_mutex_t queue_lock          = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
02568 static pthread_mutex_t wakeup_lock         = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
02569 static pthread_cond_t wakeup_cond          = PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;
02570 
02571 //static pthread_mutex_t prefetch_ready_lock = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
02572 //static pthread_cond_t  prefetch_ready_cond = PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;
02573 
02574 static pthread_mutex_t frame_done_lock     = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
02575 static pthread_cond_t frame_done_cond      = PTHREAD_COND_INITIALIZER;
02576 
02577 static volatile int seq_thread_shutdown = TRUE; 
02578 static volatile int seq_last_given_monoton_cfra = 0;
02579 static int monoton_cfra = 0;
02580 
02581 typedef struct PrefetchThread {
02582     struct PrefetchThread *next, *prev;
02583     
02584     Scene *scene;
02585     struct PrefetchQueueElem *current;
02586     pthread_t pthread;
02587     int running;
02588     
02589 } PrefetchThread;
02590 
02591 typedef struct PrefetchQueueElem {
02592     struct PrefetchQueueElem *next, *prev;
02593     
02594     int rectx;
02595     int recty;
02596     float cfra;
02597     int chanshown;
02598     int preview_render_size;
02599 
02600     int monoton_cfra;
02601 
02602     ImBuf *ibuf;
02603 } PrefetchQueueElem;
02604 
02605 #if 0
02606 static void *seq_prefetch_thread(void *This_)
02607 {
02608     PrefetchThread *This = This_;
02609 
02610     while (!seq_thread_shutdown) {
02611         PrefetchQueueElem *e;
02612         int s_last;
02613 
02614         pthread_mutex_lock(&queue_lock);
02615         e = prefetch_wait.first;
02616         if (e) {
02617             BLI_remlink(&prefetch_wait, e);
02618         }
02619         s_last = seq_last_given_monoton_cfra;
02620 
02621         This->current = e;
02622 
02623         pthread_mutex_unlock(&queue_lock);
02624 
02625         if (!e) {
02626             pthread_mutex_lock(&prefetch_ready_lock);
02627 
02628             This->running = FALSE;
02629 
02630             pthread_cond_signal(&prefetch_ready_cond);
02631             pthread_mutex_unlock(&prefetch_ready_lock);
02632 
02633             pthread_mutex_lock(&wakeup_lock);
02634             if (!seq_thread_shutdown) {
02635                 pthread_cond_wait(&wakeup_cond, &wakeup_lock);
02636             }
02637             pthread_mutex_unlock(&wakeup_lock);
02638             continue;
02639         }
02640 
02641         This->running = TRUE;
02642         
02643         if (e->cfra >= s_last) { 
02644             e->ibuf = give_ibuf_seq_impl(This->scene, 
02645                                          e->rectx, e->recty, e->cfra, e->chanshown,
02646                                          e->preview_render_size);
02647         }
02648 
02649         pthread_mutex_lock(&queue_lock);
02650 
02651         BLI_addtail(&prefetch_done, e);
02652 
02653         for (e = prefetch_wait.first; e; e = e->next) {
02654             if (s_last > e->monoton_cfra) {
02655                 BLI_remlink(&prefetch_wait, e);
02656                 MEM_freeN(e);
02657             }
02658         }
02659 
02660         for (e = prefetch_done.first; e; e = e->next) {
02661             if (s_last > e->monoton_cfra) {
02662                 BLI_remlink(&prefetch_done, e);
02663                 MEM_freeN(e);
02664             }
02665         }
02666 
02667         pthread_mutex_unlock(&queue_lock);
02668 
02669         pthread_mutex_lock(&frame_done_lock);
02670         pthread_cond_signal(&frame_done_cond);
02671         pthread_mutex_unlock(&frame_done_lock);
02672     }
02673     return 0;
02674 }
02675 
02676 static void seq_start_threads(Scene *scene)
02677 {
02678     int i;
02679 
02680     running_threads.first = running_threads.last = NULL;
02681     prefetch_wait.first = prefetch_wait.last = NULL;
02682     prefetch_done.first = prefetch_done.last = NULL;
02683 
02684     seq_thread_shutdown = FALSE;
02685     seq_last_given_monoton_cfra = monoton_cfra = 0;
02686 
02687     /* since global structures are modified during the processing
02688      * of one frame, only one render thread is currently possible...
02689      *
02690      * (but we code, in the hope, that we can remove this restriction
02691      * soon...)
02692      */
02693 
02694     fprintf(stderr, "SEQ-THREAD: seq_start_threads\n");
02695 
02696     for (i = 0; i < 1; i++) {
02697         PrefetchThread *t = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PrefetchThread), "prefetch_thread");
02698         t->scene = scene;
02699         t->running = TRUE;
02700         BLI_addtail(&running_threads, t);
02701 
02702         pthread_create(&t->pthread, NULL, seq_prefetch_thread, t);
02703     }
02704 
02705     /* init malloc mutex */
02706     BLI_init_threads(0, 0, 0);
02707 }
02708 
02709 static void seq_stop_threads()
02710 {
02711     PrefetchThread *tslot;
02712     PrefetchQueueElem *e;
02713 
02714     fprintf(stderr, "SEQ-THREAD: seq_stop_threads()\n");
02715 
02716     if (seq_thread_shutdown) {
02717         fprintf(stderr, "SEQ-THREAD: ... already stopped\n");
02718         return;
02719     }
02720     
02721     pthread_mutex_lock(&wakeup_lock);
02722 
02723     seq_thread_shutdown = TRUE;
02724 
02725     pthread_cond_broadcast(&wakeup_cond);
02726     pthread_mutex_unlock(&wakeup_lock);
02727 
02728     for (tslot = running_threads.first; tslot; tslot = tslot->next) {
02729         pthread_join(tslot->pthread, NULL);
02730     }
02731 
02732 
02733     for (e = prefetch_wait.first; e; e = e->next) {
02734         BLI_remlink(&prefetch_wait, e);
02735         MEM_freeN(e);
02736     }
02737 
02738     for (e = prefetch_done.first; e; e = e->next) {
02739         BLI_remlink(&prefetch_done, e);
02740         MEM_freeN(e);
02741     }
02742 
02743     BLI_freelistN(&running_threads);
02744 
02745     /* deinit malloc mutex */
02746     BLI_end_threads(0);
02747 }
02748 #endif
02749 
02750 void give_ibuf_prefetch_request(SeqRenderData context, float cfra, int chanshown)
02751 {
02752     PrefetchQueueElem *e;
02753     if (seq_thread_shutdown) {
02754         return;
02755     }
02756 
02757     e = MEM_callocN(sizeof(PrefetchQueueElem), "prefetch_queue_elem");
02758     e->rectx = context.rectx;
02759     e->recty = context.recty;
02760     e->cfra = cfra;
02761     e->chanshown = chanshown;
02762     e->preview_render_size = context.preview_render_size;
02763     e->monoton_cfra = monoton_cfra++;
02764 
02765     pthread_mutex_lock(&queue_lock);
02766     BLI_addtail(&prefetch_wait, e);
02767     pthread_mutex_unlock(&queue_lock);
02768     
02769     pthread_mutex_lock(&wakeup_lock);
02770     pthread_cond_signal(&wakeup_cond);
02771     pthread_mutex_unlock(&wakeup_lock);
02772 }
02773 
02774 #if 0
02775 static void seq_wait_for_prefetch_ready()
02776 {
02777     PrefetchThread *tslot;
02778 
02779     if (seq_thread_shutdown) {
02780         return;
02781     }
02782 
02783     fprintf(stderr, "SEQ-THREAD: rendering prefetch frames...\n");
02784 
02785     pthread_mutex_lock(&prefetch_ready_lock);
02786 
02787     for (;; ) {
02788         for (tslot = running_threads.first; tslot; tslot = tslot->next) {
02789             if (tslot->running) {
02790                 break;
02791             }
02792         }
02793         if (!tslot) {
02794             break;
02795         }
02796         pthread_cond_wait(&prefetch_ready_cond, &prefetch_ready_lock);
02797     }
02798 
02799     pthread_mutex_unlock(&prefetch_ready_lock);
02800 
02801     fprintf(stderr, "SEQ-THREAD: prefetch done\n");
02802 }
02803 #endif
02804 
02805 ImBuf *give_ibuf_seq_threaded(SeqRenderData context, float cfra, int chanshown)
02806 {
02807     PrefetchQueueElem *e = NULL;
02808     int found_something = FALSE;
02809 
02810     if (seq_thread_shutdown) {
02811         return give_ibuf_seq(context, cfra, chanshown);
02812     }
02813 
02814     while (!e) {
02815         int success = FALSE;
02816         pthread_mutex_lock(&queue_lock);
02817 
02818         for (e = prefetch_done.first; e; e = e->next) {
02819             if (cfra == e->cfra &&
02820                 chanshown == e->chanshown &&
02821                 context.rectx == e->rectx &&
02822                 context.recty == e->recty &&
02823                 context.preview_render_size == e->preview_render_size)
02824             {
02825                 success = TRUE;
02826                 found_something = TRUE;
02827                 break;
02828             }
02829         }
02830 
02831         if (!e) {
02832             for (e = prefetch_wait.first; e; e = e->next) {
02833                 if (cfra == e->cfra &&
02834                     chanshown == e->chanshown &&
02835                     context.rectx == e->rectx &&
02836                     context.recty == e->recty &&
02837                     context.preview_render_size == e->preview_render_size)
02838                 {
02839                     found_something = TRUE;
02840                     break;
02841                 }
02842             }
02843         }
02844 
02845         if (!e) {
02846             PrefetchThread *tslot;
02847 
02848             for (tslot = running_threads.first;
02849                  tslot;
02850                  tslot = tslot->next)
02851             {
02852                 if (tslot->current &&
02853                     cfra == tslot->current->cfra &&
02854                     chanshown == tslot->current->chanshown &&
02855                     context.rectx == tslot->current->rectx &&
02856                     context.recty == tslot->current->recty &&
02857                     context.preview_render_size == tslot->current->preview_render_size)
02858                 {
02859                     found_something = TRUE;
02860                     break;
02861                 }
02862             }
02863         }
02864 
02865         /* e->ibuf is unrefed by render thread on next round. */
02866 
02867         if (e) {
02868             seq_last_given_monoton_cfra = e->monoton_cfra;
02869         }
02870 
02871         pthread_mutex_unlock(&queue_lock);
02872 
02873         if (!success) {
02874             e = NULL;
02875 
02876             if (!found_something) {
02877                 fprintf(stderr, 
02878                         "SEQ-THREAD: Requested frame "
02879                         "not in queue ???\n");
02880                 break;
02881             }
02882             pthread_mutex_lock(&frame_done_lock);
02883             pthread_cond_wait(&frame_done_cond, &frame_done_lock);
02884             pthread_mutex_unlock(&frame_done_lock);
02885         }
02886     }
02887     
02888     return e ? e->ibuf : NULL;
02889 }
02890 
02891 /* Functions to free imbuf and anim data on changes */
02892 
02893 static void free_anim_seq(Sequence *seq)
02894 {
02895     if (seq->anim) {
02896         IMB_free_anim(seq->anim);
02897         seq->anim = NULL;
02898     }
02899 }
02900 
02901 void free_imbuf_seq(Scene *scene, ListBase *seqbase, int check_mem_usage,
02902                     int keep_file_handles)
02903 {
02904     Sequence *seq;
02905 
02906     if (check_mem_usage) {
02907         /* Let the cache limitor take care of this (schlaile) */
02908         /* While render let's keep all memory available for render 
02909          * (ton)
02910          * At least if free memory is tight...
02911          * This can make a big difference in encoding speed
02912          * (it is around 4 times(!) faster, if we do not waste time
02913          * on freeing _all_ buffers every time on long timelines...)
02914          * (schlaile)
02915          */
02916     
02917         uintptr_t mem_in_use;
02918         uintptr_t mmap_in_use;
02919         uintptr_t max;
02920     
02921         mem_in_use = MEM_get_memory_in_use();
02922         mmap_in_use = MEM_get_mapped_memory_in_use();
02923         max = MEM_CacheLimiter_get_maximum();
02924     
02925         if (max == 0 || mem_in_use + mmap_in_use <= max) {
02926             return;
02927         }
02928     }
02929 
02930     seq_stripelem_cache_cleanup();
02931     
02932     for (seq = seqbase->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
02933         if (seq->strip) {
02934             if (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIE && !keep_file_handles)
02935                 free_anim_seq(seq);
02936             if (seq->type == SEQ_SPEED) {
02937                 sequence_effect_speed_rebuild_map(scene, seq, 1);
02938             }
02939         }
02940         if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
02941             free_imbuf_seq(scene, &seq->seqbase, FALSE, keep_file_handles);
02942         }
02943         if (seq->type == SEQ_SCENE) {
02944             /* FIXME: recurs downwards, 
02945              * but do recurs protection somehow! */
02946         }
02947     }
02948     
02949 }
02950 
02951 static int update_changed_seq_recurs(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq, Sequence *changed_seq, int len_change, int ibuf_change)
02952 {
02953     Sequence *subseq;
02954     int free_imbuf = 0;
02955     
02956     /* recurs downwards to see if this seq depends on the changed seq */
02957     
02958     if (seq == NULL)
02959         return 0;
02960     
02961     if (seq == changed_seq)
02962         free_imbuf = 1;
02963     
02964     for (subseq = seq->seqbase.first; subseq; subseq = subseq->next)
02965         if (update_changed_seq_recurs(scene, subseq, changed_seq, len_change, ibuf_change))
02966             free_imbuf = TRUE;
02967     
02968     if (seq->seq1)
02969         if (update_changed_seq_recurs(scene, seq->seq1, changed_seq, len_change, ibuf_change))
02970             free_imbuf = TRUE;
02971     if (seq->seq2 && (seq->seq2 != seq->seq1))
02972         if (update_changed_seq_recurs(scene, seq->seq2, changed_seq, len_change, ibuf_change))
02973             free_imbuf = TRUE;
02974     if (seq->seq3 && (seq->seq3 != seq->seq1) && (seq->seq3 != seq->seq2))
02975         if (update_changed_seq_recurs(scene, seq->seq3, changed_seq, len_change, ibuf_change))
02976             free_imbuf = TRUE;
02977     
02978     if (free_imbuf) {
02979         if (ibuf_change) {
02980             if (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIE)
02981                 free_anim_seq(seq);
02982             if (seq->type == SEQ_SPEED) {
02983                 sequence_effect_speed_rebuild_map(scene, seq, 1);
02984             }
02985         }
02986         
02987         if (len_change)
02988             calc_sequence(scene, seq);
02989     }
02990     
02991     return free_imbuf;
02992 }
02993 
02994 void update_changed_seq_and_deps(Scene *scene, Sequence *changed_seq, int len_change, int ibuf_change)
02995 {
02996     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
02997     Sequence *seq;
02998     
02999     if (ed == NULL) return;
03000     
03001     for (seq = ed->seqbase.first; seq; seq = seq->next)
03002         update_changed_seq_recurs(scene, seq, changed_seq, len_change, ibuf_change);
03003 }
03004 
03005 /* seq funcs's for transforming internally
03006  * notice the difference between start/end and left/right.
03007  *
03008  * left and right are the bounds at which the sequence is rendered,
03009  * start and end are from the start and fixed length of the sequence.
03010  */
03011 int seq_tx_get_start(Sequence *seq)
03012 {
03013     return seq->start;
03014 }
03015 int seq_tx_get_end(Sequence *seq)
03016 {
03017     return seq->start + seq->len;
03018 }
03019 
03020 int seq_tx_get_final_left(Sequence *seq, int metaclip)
03021 {
03022     if (metaclip && seq->tmp) {
03023         /* return the range clipped by the parents range */
03024         return MAX2(seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0), seq_tx_get_final_left((Sequence *)seq->tmp, 1) );
03025     }
03026     else {
03027         return (seq->start - seq->startstill) + seq->startofs;
03028     }
03029 
03030 }
03031 int seq_tx_get_final_right(Sequence *seq, int metaclip)
03032 {
03033     if (metaclip && seq->tmp) {
03034         /* return the range clipped by the parents range */
03035         return MIN2(seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0), seq_tx_get_final_right((Sequence *)seq->tmp, 1) );
03036     }
03037     else {
03038         return ((seq->start + seq->len) + seq->endstill) - seq->endofs;
03039     }
03040 }
03041 
03042 void seq_tx_set_final_left(Sequence *seq, int val)
03043 {
03044     if (val < (seq)->start) {
03045         seq->startstill = abs(val - (seq)->start);
03046         seq->startofs = 0;
03047     }
03048     else {
03049         seq->startofs = abs(val - (seq)->start);
03050         seq->startstill = 0;
03051     }
03052 }
03053 
03054 void seq_tx_set_final_right(Sequence *seq, int val)
03055 {
03056     if (val > (seq)->start + (seq)->len) {
03057         seq->endstill = abs(val - (seq->start + (seq)->len));
03058         seq->endofs = 0;
03059     }
03060     else {
03061         seq->endofs = abs(val - ((seq)->start + (seq)->len));
03062         seq->endstill = 0;
03063     }
03064 }
03065 
03066 /* used so we can do a quick check for single image seq
03067  * since they work a bit differently to normal image seq's (during transform) */
03068 int seq_single_check(Sequence *seq)
03069 {
03070     return ((seq->len == 1) &&
03071             (seq->type == SEQ_IMAGE ||
03072              ((seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) &&
03073               get_sequence_effect_num_inputs(seq->type) == 0)));
03074 }
03075 
03076 /* check if the selected seq's reference unselected seq's */
03077 int seqbase_isolated_sel_check(ListBase *seqbase)
03078 {
03079     Sequence *seq;
03080     /* is there more than 1 select */
03081     int ok = FALSE;
03082 
03083     for (seq = seqbase->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03084         if (seq->flag & SELECT) {
03085             ok = TRUE;
03086             break;
03087         }
03088     }
03089 
03090     if (ok == FALSE)
03091         return FALSE;
03092 
03093     /* test relationships */
03094     for (seq = seqbase->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03095         if ((seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) == 0)
03096             continue;
03097 
03098         if (seq->flag & SELECT) {
03099             if ( (seq->seq1 && (seq->seq1->flag & SELECT) == 0) ||
03100                  (seq->seq2 && (seq->seq2->flag & SELECT) == 0) ||
03101                  (seq->seq3 && (seq->seq3->flag & SELECT) == 0) )
03102                 return FALSE;
03103         }
03104         else {
03105             if ( (seq->seq1 && (seq->seq1->flag & SELECT)) ||
03106                  (seq->seq2 && (seq->seq2->flag & SELECT)) ||
03107                  (seq->seq3 && (seq->seq3->flag & SELECT)) )
03108                 return FALSE;
03109         }
03110     }
03111 
03112     return TRUE;
03113 }
03114 
03115 /* use to impose limits when dragging/extending - so impossible situations don't happen
03116  * Cant use the SEQ_LEFTSEL and SEQ_LEFTSEL directly because the strip may be in a metastrip */
03117 void seq_tx_handle_xlimits(Sequence *seq, int leftflag, int rightflag)
03118 {
03119     if (leftflag) {
03120         if (seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0) >= seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0)) {
03121             seq_tx_set_final_left(seq, seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0) - 1);
03122         }
03123 
03124         if (seq_single_check(seq) == 0) {
03125             if (seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0) >= seq_tx_get_end(seq)) {
03126                 seq_tx_set_final_left(seq, seq_tx_get_end(seq) - 1);
03127             }
03128 
03129             /* dosnt work now - TODO */
03130 #if 0
03131             if (seq_tx_get_start(seq) >= seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0)) {
03132                 int ofs;
03133                 ofs = seq_tx_get_start(seq) - seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0);
03134                 seq->start -= ofs;
03135                 seq_tx_set_final_left(seq, seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0) + ofs);
03136             }
03137 #endif
03138         }
03139     }
03140 
03141     if (rightflag) {
03142         if (seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0) <=  seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0)) {
03143             seq_tx_set_final_right(seq, seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0) + 1);
03144         }
03145 
03146         if (seq_single_check(seq) == 0) {
03147             if (seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0) <= seq_tx_get_start(seq)) {
03148                 seq_tx_set_final_right(seq, seq_tx_get_start(seq) + 1);
03149             }
03150         }
03151     }
03152 
03153     /* sounds cannot be extended past their endpoints */
03154     if (seq->type == SEQ_SOUND) {
03155         seq->startstill = 0;
03156         seq->endstill = 0;
03157     }
03158 }
03159 
03160 void seq_single_fix(Sequence *seq)
03161 {
03162     int left, start, offset;
03163     if (!seq_single_check(seq))
03164         return;
03165 
03166     /* make sure the image is always at the start since there is only one,
03167      * adjusting its start should be ok */
03168     left = seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0);
03169     start = seq->start;
03170     if (start != left) {
03171         offset = left - start;
03172         seq_tx_set_final_left(seq, seq_tx_get_final_left(seq, 0) - offset);
03173         seq_tx_set_final_right(seq, seq_tx_get_final_right(seq, 0) - offset);
03174         seq->start += offset;
03175     }
03176 }
03177 
03178 int seq_tx_test(Sequence *seq)
03179 {
03180     return (seq->type < SEQ_EFFECT) || (get_sequence_effect_num_inputs(seq->type) == 0);
03181 }
03182 
03183 static int seq_overlap(Sequence *seq1, Sequence *seq2)
03184 {
03185     return (seq1 != seq2 && seq1->machine == seq2->machine &&
03186             ((seq1->enddisp <= seq2->startdisp) || (seq1->startdisp >= seq2->enddisp)) == 0);
03187 }
03188 
03189 int seq_test_overlap(ListBase *seqbasep, Sequence *test)
03190 {
03191     Sequence *seq;
03192 
03193     seq = seqbasep->first;
03194     while (seq) {
03195         if (seq_overlap(test, seq))
03196             return 1;
03197 
03198         seq = seq->next;
03199     }
03200     return 0;
03201 }
03202 
03203 
03204 void seq_translate(Scene *evil_scene, Sequence *seq, int delta)
03205 {
03206     seq_offset_animdata(evil_scene, seq, delta);
03207     seq->start += delta;
03208 
03209     if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
03210         Sequence *seq_child;
03211         for (seq_child = seq->seqbase.first; seq_child; seq_child = seq_child->next) {
03212             seq_translate(evil_scene, seq_child, delta);
03213         }
03214     }
03215 
03216     calc_sequence_disp(evil_scene, seq);
03217 }
03218 
03219 void seq_sound_init(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
03220 {
03221     if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
03222         Sequence *seq_child;
03223         for (seq_child = seq->seqbase.first; seq_child; seq_child = seq_child->next) {
03224             seq_sound_init(scene, seq_child);
03225         }
03226     }
03227     else {
03228         if (seq->sound) {
03229             seq->scene_sound = sound_add_scene_sound_defaults(scene, seq);
03230         }
03231         if (seq->scene) {
03232             sound_scene_add_scene_sound_defaults(scene, seq);
03233         }
03234     }
03235 }
03236 
03237 Sequence *seq_foreground_frame_get(Scene *scene, int frame)
03238 {
03239     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
03240     Sequence *seq, *best_seq = NULL;
03241     int best_machine = -1;
03242     
03243     if (!ed) return NULL;
03244     
03245     for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03246         if (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE || seq->startdisp > frame || seq->enddisp <= frame)
03247             continue;
03248         /* only use elements you can see - not */
03249         if (ELEM5(seq->type, SEQ_IMAGE, SEQ_META, SEQ_SCENE, SEQ_MOVIE, SEQ_COLOR)) {
03250             if (seq->machine > best_machine) {
03251                 best_seq = seq;
03252                 best_machine = seq->machine;
03253             }
03254         }
03255     }
03256     return best_seq;
03257 }
03258 
03259 /* return 0 if there werent enough space */
03260 int shuffle_seq(ListBase *seqbasep, Sequence *test, Scene *evil_scene)
03261 {
03262     int orig_machine = test->machine;
03263     test->machine++;
03264     calc_sequence(evil_scene, test);
03265     while (seq_test_overlap(seqbasep, test) ) {
03266         if (test->machine >= MAXSEQ) {
03267             break;
03268         }
03269         test->machine++;
03270         calc_sequence(evil_scene, test); // XXX - I don't think this is needed since were only moving vertically, Campbell.
03271     }
03272 
03273     
03274     if (test->machine >= MAXSEQ) {
03275         /* Blender 2.4x would remove the strip.
03276          * nicer to move it to the end */
03277 
03278         Sequence *seq;
03279         int new_frame = test->enddisp;
03280 
03281         for (seq = seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03282             if (seq->machine == orig_machine)
03283                 new_frame = MAX2(new_frame, seq->enddisp);
03284         }
03285 
03286         test->machine = orig_machine;
03287         new_frame = new_frame + (test->start - test->startdisp); /* adjust by the startdisp */
03288         seq_translate(evil_scene, test, new_frame - test->start);
03289 
03290         calc_sequence(evil_scene, test);
03291         return 0;
03292     }
03293     else {
03294         return 1;
03295     }
03296 }
03297 
03298 static int shuffle_seq_time_offset_test(ListBase *seqbasep, char dir)
03299 {
03300     int offset = 0;
03301     Sequence *seq, *seq_other;
03302 
03303     for (seq = seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03304         if (seq->tmp) {
03305             for (seq_other = seqbasep->first; seq_other; seq_other = seq_other->next) {
03306                 if (!seq_other->tmp && seq_overlap(seq, seq_other)) {
03307                     if (dir == 'L') {
03308                         offset = MIN2(offset, seq_other->startdisp - seq->enddisp);
03309                     }
03310                     else {
03311                         offset = MAX2(offset, seq_other->enddisp - seq->startdisp);
03312                     }
03313                 }
03314             }
03315         }
03316     }
03317     return offset;
03318 }
03319 
03320 static int shuffle_seq_time_offset(Scene *scene, ListBase *seqbasep, char dir)
03321 {
03322     int ofs = 0;
03323     int tot_ofs = 0;
03324     Sequence *seq;
03325     while ( (ofs = shuffle_seq_time_offset_test(seqbasep, dir)) ) {
03326         for (seq = seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03327             if (seq->tmp) {
03328                 /* seq_test_overlap only tests display values */
03329                 seq->startdisp +=   ofs;
03330                 seq->enddisp +=     ofs;
03331             }
03332         }
03333 
03334         tot_ofs += ofs;
03335     }
03336 
03337     for (seq = seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03338         if (seq->tmp)
03339             calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);  /* corrects dummy startdisp/enddisp values */
03340     }
03341 
03342     return tot_ofs;
03343 }
03344 
03345 int shuffle_seq_time(ListBase *seqbasep, Scene *evil_scene)
03346 {
03347     /* note: seq->tmp is used to tag strips to move */
03348 
03349     Sequence *seq;
03350 
03351     int offset_l = shuffle_seq_time_offset(evil_scene, seqbasep, 'L');
03352     int offset_r = shuffle_seq_time_offset(evil_scene, seqbasep, 'R');
03353     int offset = (-offset_l < offset_r) ?  offset_l : offset_r;
03354 
03355     if (offset) {
03356         for (seq = seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03357             if (seq->tmp) {
03358                 seq_translate(evil_scene, seq, offset);
03359                 seq->flag &= ~SEQ_OVERLAP;
03360             }
03361         }
03362     }
03363 
03364     return offset ? 0 : 1;
03365 }
03366 
03367 void seq_update_sound_bounds_all(Scene *scene)
03368 {
03369     Editing *ed = scene->ed;
03370 
03371     if (ed) {
03372         Sequence *seq;
03373 
03374         for (seq = ed->seqbase.first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03375             if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
03376                 seq_update_sound_bounds_recursive(scene, seq);
03377             }
03378             else if (ELEM(seq->type, SEQ_SOUND, SEQ_SCENE)) {
03379                 seq_update_sound_bounds(scene, seq);
03380             }
03381         }
03382     }
03383 }
03384 
03385 void seq_update_sound_bounds(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
03386 {
03387     sound_move_scene_sound_defaults(scene, seq);
03388     /* mute is set in seq_update_muting_recursive */
03389 }
03390 
03391 static void seq_update_muting_recursive(ListBase *seqbasep, Sequence *metaseq, int mute)
03392 {
03393     Sequence *seq;
03394     int seqmute;
03395 
03396     /* for sound we go over full meta tree to update muted state,
03397      * since sound is played outside of evaluating the imbufs, */
03398     for (seq = seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03399         seqmute = (mute || (seq->flag & SEQ_MUTE));
03400 
03401         if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
03402             /* if this is the current meta sequence, unmute because
03403              * all sequences above this were set to mute */
03404             if (seq == metaseq)
03405                 seqmute = 0;
03406 
03407             seq_update_muting_recursive(&seq->seqbase, metaseq, seqmute);
03408         }
03409         else if (ELEM(seq->type, SEQ_SOUND, SEQ_SCENE)) {
03410             if (seq->scene_sound) {
03411                 sound_mute_scene_sound(seq->scene_sound, seqmute);
03412             }
03413         }
03414     }
03415 }
03416 
03417 void seq_update_muting(Editing *ed)
03418 {
03419     if (ed) {
03420         /* mute all sounds up to current metastack list */
03421         MetaStack *ms = ed->metastack.last;
03422 
03423         if (ms)
03424             seq_update_muting_recursive(&ed->seqbase, ms->parseq, 1);
03425         else
03426             seq_update_muting_recursive(&ed->seqbase, NULL, 0);
03427     }
03428 }
03429 
03430 static void seq_update_sound_recursive(Scene *scene, ListBase *seqbasep, bSound *sound)
03431 {
03432     Sequence *seq;
03433 
03434     for (seq = seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03435         if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
03436             seq_update_sound_recursive(scene, &seq->seqbase, sound);
03437         }
03438         else if (seq->type == SEQ_SOUND) {
03439             if (seq->scene_sound && sound == seq->sound) {
03440                 sound_update_scene_sound(seq->scene_sound, sound);
03441             }
03442         }
03443     }
03444 }
03445 
03446 void seq_update_sound(struct Scene *scene, struct bSound *sound)
03447 {
03448     if (scene->ed) {
03449         seq_update_sound_recursive(scene, &scene->ed->seqbase, sound);
03450     }
03451 }
03452 
03453 /* in cases where we done know the sequence's listbase */
03454 ListBase *seq_seqbase(ListBase *seqbase, Sequence *seq)
03455 {
03456     Sequence *iseq;
03457     ListBase *lb = NULL;
03458 
03459     for (iseq = seqbase->first; iseq; iseq = iseq->next) {
03460         if (seq == iseq) {
03461             return seqbase;
03462         }
03463         else if (iseq->seqbase.first && (lb = seq_seqbase(&iseq->seqbase, seq))) {
03464             return lb;
03465         }
03466     }
03467 
03468     return NULL;
03469 }
03470 
03471 Sequence *seq_metastrip(ListBase *seqbase, Sequence *meta, Sequence *seq)
03472 {
03473     Sequence *iseq;
03474 
03475     for (iseq = seqbase->first; iseq; iseq = iseq->next) {
03476         Sequence *rval;
03477 
03478         if (seq == iseq) {
03479             return meta;
03480         }
03481         else if (iseq->seqbase.first &&
03482                  (rval = seq_metastrip(&iseq->seqbase, iseq, seq))) {
03483             return rval;
03484         }
03485     }
03486 
03487     return NULL;
03488 }
03489 
03490 int seq_swap(Sequence *seq_a, Sequence *seq_b, const char **error_str)
03491 {
03492     char name[sizeof(seq_a->name)];
03493 
03494     if (seq_a->len != seq_b->len) {
03495         *error_str = "Strips must be the same length";
03496         return 0;
03497     }
03498 
03499     /* type checking, could be more advanced but disalow sound vs non-sound copy */
03500     if (seq_a->type != seq_b->type) {
03501         if (seq_a->type == SEQ_SOUND || seq_b->type == SEQ_SOUND) {
03502             *error_str = "Strips were not compatible";
03503             return 0;
03504         }
03505 
03506         /* disallow effects to swap with non-effects strips */
03507         if ((seq_a->type & SEQ_EFFECT) != (seq_b->type & SEQ_EFFECT)) {
03508             *error_str = "Strips were not compatible";
03509             return 0;
03510         }
03511 
03512         if ((seq_a->type & SEQ_EFFECT) && (seq_b->type & SEQ_EFFECT)) {
03513             if (get_sequence_effect_num_inputs(seq_a->type) != get_sequence_effect_num_inputs(seq_b->type)) {
03514                 *error_str = "Strips must have the same number of inputs";
03515                 return 0;
03516             }
03517         }
03518     }
03519 
03520     SWAP(Sequence, *seq_a, *seq_b);
03521 
03522     /* swap back names so animation fcurves don't get swapped */
03523     BLI_strncpy(name, seq_a->name + 2, sizeof(name));
03524     BLI_strncpy(seq_a->name + 2, seq_b->name + 2, sizeof(seq_b->name) - 2);
03525     BLI_strncpy(seq_b->name + 2, name, sizeof(seq_b->name) - 2);
03526 
03527     /* swap back opacity, and overlay mode */
03528     SWAP(int, seq_a->blend_mode, seq_b->blend_mode);
03529     SWAP(float, seq_a->blend_opacity, seq_b->blend_opacity);
03530 
03531 
03532     SWAP(void *, seq_a->prev, seq_b->prev);
03533     SWAP(void *, seq_a->next, seq_b->next);
03534     SWAP(int, seq_a->start, seq_b->start);
03535     SWAP(int, seq_a->startofs, seq_b->startofs);
03536     SWAP(int, seq_a->endofs, seq_b->endofs);
03537     SWAP(int, seq_a->startstill, seq_b->startstill);
03538     SWAP(int, seq_a->endstill, seq_b->endstill);
03539     SWAP(int, seq_a->machine, seq_b->machine);
03540     SWAP(int, seq_a->startdisp, seq_b->startdisp);
03541     SWAP(int, seq_a->enddisp, seq_b->enddisp);
03542 
03543     return 1;
03544 }
03545 
03546 /* XXX - hackish function needed for transforming strips! TODO - have some better solution */
03547 void seq_offset_animdata(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq, int ofs)
03548 {
03549     char str[SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR + 3];
03550     FCurve *fcu;
03551 
03552     if (scene->adt == NULL || ofs == 0 || scene->adt->action == NULL)
03553         return;
03554 
03555     BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "[\"%s\"]", seq->name + 2);
03556 
03557     for (fcu = scene->adt->action->curves.first; fcu; fcu = fcu->next) {
03558         if (strstr(fcu->rna_path, "sequence_editor.sequences_all[") && strstr(fcu->rna_path, str)) {
03559             unsigned int i;
03560             for (i = 0; i < fcu->totvert; i++) {
03561                 BezTriple *bezt = &fcu->bezt[i];
03562                 bezt->vec[0][0] += ofs;
03563                 bezt->vec[1][0] += ofs;
03564                 bezt->vec[2][0] += ofs;
03565             }
03566         }
03567     }
03568 }
03569 
03570 void seq_dupe_animdata(Scene *scene, const char *name_src, const char *name_dst)
03571 {
03572     char str_from[SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR + 3];
03573     FCurve *fcu;
03574     FCurve *fcu_last;
03575     FCurve *fcu_cpy;
03576     ListBase lb = {NULL, NULL};
03577 
03578     if (scene->adt == NULL || scene->adt->action == NULL)
03579         return;
03580 
03581     BLI_snprintf(str_from, sizeof(str_from), "[\"%s\"]", name_src);
03582 
03583     fcu_last = scene->adt->action->curves.last;
03584 
03585     for (fcu = scene->adt->action->curves.first; fcu && fcu->prev != fcu_last; fcu = fcu->next) {
03586         if (strstr(fcu->rna_path, "sequence_editor.sequences_all[") && strstr(fcu->rna_path, str_from)) {
03587             fcu_cpy = copy_fcurve(fcu);
03588             BLI_addtail(&lb, fcu_cpy);
03589         }
03590     }
03591 
03592     /* notice validate is 0, keep this because the seq may not be added to the scene yet */
03593     BKE_animdata_fix_paths_rename(&scene->id, scene->adt, NULL, "sequence_editor.sequences_all", name_src, name_dst, 0, 0, 0);
03594 
03595     /* add the original fcurves back */
03596     BLI_movelisttolist(&scene->adt->action->curves, &lb);
03597 }
03598 
03599 /* XXX - hackish function needed to remove all fcurves belonging to a sequencer strip */
03600 static void seq_free_animdata(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
03601 {
03602     char str[SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR + 3];
03603     FCurve *fcu;
03604 
03605     if (scene->adt == NULL || scene->adt->action == NULL)
03606         return;
03607 
03608     BLI_snprintf(str, sizeof(str), "[\"%s\"]", seq->name + 2);
03609 
03610     fcu = scene->adt->action->curves.first;
03611 
03612     while (fcu) {
03613         if (strstr(fcu->rna_path, "sequence_editor.sequences_all[") && strstr(fcu->rna_path, str)) {
03614             FCurve *next_fcu = fcu->next;
03615             
03616             BLI_remlink(&scene->adt->action->curves, fcu);
03617             free_fcurve(fcu);
03618 
03619             fcu = next_fcu;
03620         }
03621         else {
03622             fcu = fcu->next;
03623         }
03624     }
03625 }
03626 
03627 
03628 Sequence *get_seq_by_name(ListBase *seqbase, const char *name, int recursive)
03629 {
03630     Sequence *iseq = NULL;
03631     Sequence *rseq = NULL;
03632 
03633     for (iseq = seqbase->first; iseq; iseq = iseq->next) {
03634         if (strcmp(name, iseq->name + 2) == 0)
03635             return iseq;
03636         else if (recursive && (iseq->seqbase.first) && (rseq = get_seq_by_name(&iseq->seqbase, name, 1))) {
03637             return rseq;
03638         }
03639     }
03640 
03641     return NULL;
03642 }
03643 
03644 
03645 Sequence *seq_active_get(Scene *scene)
03646 {
03647     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
03648     if (ed == NULL) return NULL;
03649     return ed->act_seq;
03650 }
03651 
03652 void seq_active_set(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq)
03653 {
03654     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
03655     if (ed == NULL) return;
03656 
03657     ed->act_seq = seq;
03658 }
03659 
03660 int seq_active_pair_get(Scene *scene, Sequence **seq_act, Sequence **seq_other)
03661 {
03662     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, FALSE);
03663 
03664     *seq_act = seq_active_get(scene);
03665 
03666     if (*seq_act == NULL) {
03667         return 0;
03668     }
03669     else {
03670         Sequence *seq;
03671 
03672         *seq_other = NULL;
03673 
03674         for (seq = ed->seqbasep->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
03675             if (seq->flag & SELECT && (seq != (*seq_act))) {
03676                 if (*seq_other) {
03677                     return 0;
03678                 }
03679                 else {
03680                     *seq_other = seq;
03681                 }
03682             }
03683         }
03684 
03685         return (*seq_other != NULL);
03686     }
03687 }
03688 
03689 /* api like funcs for adding */
03690 
03691 void seq_load_apply(Scene *scene, Sequence *seq, SeqLoadInfo *seq_load)
03692 {
03693     if (seq) {
03694         BLI_strncpy(seq->name + 2, seq_load->name, sizeof(seq->name) - 2);
03695         seqbase_unique_name_recursive(&scene->ed->seqbase, seq);
03696 
03697         if (seq_load->flag & SEQ_LOAD_FRAME_ADVANCE) {
03698             seq_load->start_frame += (seq->enddisp - seq->startdisp);
03699         }
03700 
03701         if (seq_load->flag & SEQ_LOAD_REPLACE_SEL) {
03702             seq_load->flag |= SELECT;
03703             seq_active_set(scene, seq);
03704         }
03705 
03706         if (seq_load->flag & SEQ_LOAD_SOUND_CACHE) {
03707             if (seq->sound)
03708                 sound_cache(seq->sound);
03709         }
03710 
03711         seq_load->tot_success++;
03712     }
03713     else {
03714         seq_load->tot_error++;
03715     }
03716 }
03717 
03718 Sequence *alloc_sequence(ListBase *lb, int cfra, int machine)
03719 {
03720     Sequence *seq;
03721 
03722     seq = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Sequence), "addseq");
03723     BLI_addtail(lb, seq);
03724 
03725     *( (short *)seq->name) = ID_SEQ;
03726     seq->name[2] = 0;
03727 
03728     seq->flag = SELECT;
03729     seq->start = cfra;
03730     seq->machine = machine;
03731     seq->sat = 1.0;
03732     seq->mul = 1.0;
03733     seq->blend_opacity = 100.0;
03734     seq->volume = 1.0f;
03735     seq->pitch = 1.0f;
03736     seq->scene_sound = NULL;
03737 
03738     return seq;
03739 }
03740 
03741 /* NOTE: this function doesn't fill in image names */
03742 Sequence *sequencer_add_image_strip(bContext *C, ListBase *seqbasep, SeqLoadInfo *seq_load)
03743 {
03744     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C); /* only for active seq */
03745     Sequence *seq;
03746     Strip *strip;
03747 
03748     seq = alloc_sequence(seqbasep, seq_load->start_frame, seq_load->channel);
03749     seq->type = SEQ_IMAGE;
03750     seq->blend_mode = SEQ_CROSS; /* so alpha adjustment fade to the strip below */
03751     
03752     /* basic defaults */
03753     seq->strip = strip = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Strip), "strip");
03754 
03755     seq->len = seq_load->len ? seq_load->len : 1;
03756     strip->us = 1;
03757     strip->stripdata = MEM_callocN(seq->len * sizeof(StripElem), "stripelem");
03758     BLI_strncpy(strip->dir, seq_load->path, sizeof(strip->dir));
03759 
03760     seq_load_apply(scene, seq, seq_load);
03761 
03762     return seq;
03763 }
03764 
03765 #ifdef WITH_AUDASPACE
03766 Sequence *sequencer_add_sound_strip(bContext *C, ListBase *seqbasep, SeqLoadInfo *seq_load)
03767 {
03768     Main *bmain = CTX_data_main(C);
03769     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C); /* only for sound */
03770     Editing *ed = seq_give_editing(scene, TRUE);
03771     bSound *sound;
03772 
03773     Sequence *seq;  /* generic strip vars */
03774     Strip *strip;
03775     StripElem *se;
03776 
03777     AUD_SoundInfo info;
03778 
03779     sound = sound_new_file(CTX_data_main(C), seq_load->path); /* handles relative paths */
03780 
03781     if (sound == NULL || sound->playback_handle == NULL) {
03782         //if (op)
03783         //  BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unsupported audio format");
03784         return NULL;
03785     }
03786 
03787     info = AUD_getInfo(sound->playback_handle);
03788 
03789     if (info.specs.channels == AUD_CHANNELS_INVALID) {
03790         sound_delete(bmain, sound);
03791         //if (op)
03792         //  BKE_report(op->reports, RPT_ERROR, "Unsupported audio format");
03793         return NULL;
03794     }
03795 
03796     seq = alloc_sequence(seqbasep, seq_load->start_frame, seq_load->channel);
03797 
03798     seq->type = SEQ_SOUND;
03799     seq->sound = sound;
03800     BLI_strncpy(seq->name + 2, "Sound", SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR - 2);
03801     seqbase_unique_name_recursive(&scene->ed->seqbase, seq);
03802 
03803     /* basic defaults */
03804     seq->strip = strip = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Strip), "strip");
03805     seq->len = ceil(info.length * FPS);
03806     strip->us = 1;
03807 
03808     /* we only need 1 element to store the filename */
03809     strip->stripdata = se = MEM_callocN(sizeof(StripElem), "stripelem");
03810 
03811     BLI_split_dirfile(seq_load->path, strip->dir, se->name, sizeof(strip->dir), sizeof(se->name));
03812 
03813     seq->scene_sound = sound_add_scene_sound(scene, seq, seq_load->start_frame, seq_load->start_frame + seq->len, 0);
03814 
03815     calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);
03816 
03817     /* last active name */
03818     BLI_strncpy(ed->act_sounddir, strip->dir, FILE_MAXDIR);
03819 
03820     seq_load_apply(scene, seq, seq_load);
03821 
03822     return seq;
03823 }
03824 #else // WITH_AUDASPACE
03825 Sequence *sequencer_add_sound_strip(bContext *C, ListBase *seqbasep, SeqLoadInfo *seq_load)
03826 {
03827     (void)C;
03828     (void)seqbasep;
03829     (void)seq_load;
03830     return NULL;
03831 }
03832 #endif // WITH_AUDASPACE
03833 
03834 Sequence *sequencer_add_movie_strip(bContext *C, ListBase *seqbasep, SeqLoadInfo *seq_load)
03835 {
03836     Scene *scene = CTX_data_scene(C); /* only for sound */
03837     char path[sizeof(seq_load->path)];
03838 
03839     Sequence *seq;  /* generic strip vars */
03840     Strip *strip;
03841     StripElem *se;
03842 
03843     struct anim *an;
03844 
03845     BLI_strncpy(path, seq_load->path, sizeof(path));
03846     BLI_path_abs(path, G.main->name);
03847 
03848     an = openanim(path, IB_rect, 0);
03849 
03850     if (an == NULL)
03851         return NULL;
03852 
03853     seq = alloc_sequence(seqbasep, seq_load->start_frame, seq_load->channel);
03854     seq->type = SEQ_MOVIE;
03855     seq->blend_mode = SEQ_CROSS; /* so alpha adjustment fade to the strip below */
03856 
03857     seq->anim = an;
03858     seq->anim_preseek = IMB_anim_get_preseek(an);
03859     BLI_strncpy(seq->name + 2, "Movie", SEQ_NAME_MAXSTR - 2);
03860     seqbase_unique_name_recursive(&scene->ed->seqbase, seq);
03861 
03862     /* basic defaults */
03863     seq->strip = strip = MEM_callocN(sizeof(Strip), "strip");
03864     seq->len = IMB_anim_get_duration(an, IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN);
03865     strip->us = 1;
03866 
03867     /* we only need 1 element for MOVIE strips */
03868     strip->stripdata = se = MEM_callocN(sizeof(StripElem), "stripelem");
03869 
03870     BLI_split_dirfile(seq_load->path, strip->dir, se->name, sizeof(strip->dir), sizeof(se->name));
03871 
03872     calc_sequence_disp(scene, seq);
03873 
03874 
03875     if (seq_load->flag & SEQ_LOAD_MOVIE_SOUND) {
03876         int start_frame_back = seq_load->start_frame;
03877         seq_load->channel++;
03878 
03879         sequencer_add_sound_strip(C, seqbasep, seq_load);
03880 
03881         seq_load->start_frame = start_frame_back;
03882         seq_load->channel--;
03883     }
03884 
03885     if (seq_load->name[0] == '\0')
03886         BLI_strncpy(seq_load->name, se->name, sizeof(seq_load->name));
03887 
03888     /* can be NULL */
03889     seq_load_apply(scene, seq, seq_load);
03890 
03891     return seq;
03892 }
03893 
03894 
03895 static Sequence *seq_dupli(struct Scene *scene, struct Scene *scene_to, Sequence *seq, int dupe_flag)
03896 {
03897     Scene *sce_audio = scene_to ? scene_to : scene;
03898     Sequence *seqn = MEM_dupallocN(seq);
03899 
03900     seq->tmp = seqn;
03901     seqn->strip = MEM_dupallocN(seq->strip);
03902 
03903     // XXX: add F-Curve duplication stuff?
03904 
03905     if (seq->strip->crop) {
03906         seqn->strip->crop = MEM_dupallocN(seq->strip->crop);
03907     }
03908 
03909     if (seq->strip->transform) {
03910         seqn->strip->transform = MEM_dupallocN(seq->strip->transform);
03911     }
03912 
03913     if (seq->strip->proxy) {
03914         seqn->strip->proxy = MEM_dupallocN(seq->strip->proxy);
03915         seqn->strip->proxy->anim = NULL;
03916     }
03917 
03918     if (seq->strip->color_balance) {
03919         seqn->strip->color_balance
03920             = MEM_dupallocN(seq->strip->color_balance);
03921     }
03922 
03923     if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
03924         seqn->strip->stripdata = NULL;
03925 
03926         seqn->seqbase.first = seqn->seqbase.last = NULL;
03927         /* WATCH OUT!!! - This metastrip is not recursively duplicated here - do this after!!! */
03928         /* - seq_dupli_recursive(&seq->seqbase,&seqn->seqbase);*/
03929     }
03930     else if (seq->type == SEQ_SCENE) {
03931         seqn->strip->stripdata = NULL;
03932         if (seq->scene_sound)
03933             seqn->scene_sound = sound_scene_add_scene_sound_defaults(sce_audio, seqn);
03934     }
03935     else if (seq->type == SEQ_MOVIE) {
03936         seqn->strip->stripdata =
03937                 MEM_dupallocN(seq->strip->stripdata);
03938         seqn->anim = NULL;
03939     }
03940     else if (seq->type == SEQ_SOUND) {
03941         seqn->strip->stripdata =
03942                 MEM_dupallocN(seq->strip->stripdata);
03943         if (seq->scene_sound)
03944             seqn->scene_sound = sound_add_scene_sound_defaults(sce_audio, seqn);
03945 
03946         seqn->sound->id.us++;
03947     }
03948     else if (seq->type == SEQ_IMAGE) {
03949         seqn->strip->stripdata =
03950                 MEM_dupallocN(seq->strip->stripdata);
03951     }
03952     else if (seq->type >= SEQ_EFFECT) {
03953         if (seq->seq1 && seq->seq1->tmp) seqn->seq1 = seq->seq1->tmp;
03954         if (seq->seq2 && seq->seq2->tmp) seqn->seq2 = seq->seq2->tmp;
03955         if (seq->seq3 && seq->seq3->tmp) seqn->seq3 = seq->seq3->tmp;
03956 
03957         if (seq->type & SEQ_EFFECT) {
03958             struct SeqEffectHandle sh;
03959             sh = get_sequence_effect(seq);
03960             if (sh.copy)
03961                 sh.copy(seq, seqn);
03962         }
03963 
03964         seqn->strip->stripdata = NULL;
03965 
03966     }
03967     else {
03968         fprintf(stderr, "Aiiiiekkk! sequence type not "
03969                 "handled in duplicate!\nExpect a crash"
03970                 " now...\n");
03971     }
03972 
03973     if (dupe_flag & SEQ_DUPE_UNIQUE_NAME)
03974         seqbase_unique_name_recursive(&scene->ed->seqbase, seqn);
03975 
03976     if (dupe_flag & SEQ_DUPE_ANIM)
03977         seq_dupe_animdata(scene, seq->name + 2, seqn->name + 2);
03978 
03979     return seqn;
03980 }
03981 
03982 Sequence *seq_dupli_recursive(struct Scene *scene, struct Scene *scene_to, Sequence *seq, int dupe_flag)
03983 {
03984     Sequence *seqn = seq_dupli(scene, scene_to, seq, dupe_flag);
03985     if (seq->type == SEQ_META) {
03986         Sequence *s;
03987         for (s = seq->seqbase.first; s; s = s->next) {
03988             Sequence *n = seq_dupli_recursive(scene, scene_to, s, dupe_flag);
03989             if (n) {
03990                 BLI_addtail(&seqn->seqbase, n);
03991             }
03992         }
03993     }
03994     return seqn;
03995 }
03996 
03997 void seqbase_dupli_recursive(Scene *scene, Scene *scene_to, ListBase *nseqbase, ListBase *seqbase, int dupe_flag)
03998 {
03999     Sequence *seq;
04000     Sequence *seqn = NULL;
04001     Sequence *last_seq = seq_active_get(scene);
04002 
04003     for (seq = seqbase->first; seq; seq = seq->next) {
04004         seq->tmp = NULL;
04005         if ((seq->flag & SELECT) || (dupe_flag & SEQ_DUPE_ALL)) {
04006             seqn = seq_dupli(scene, scene_to, seq, dupe_flag);
04007             if (seqn) { /*should never fail */
04008                 if (dupe_flag & SEQ_DUPE_CONTEXT) {
04009                     seq->flag &= ~SEQ_ALLSEL;
04010                     seqn->flag &= ~(SEQ_LEFTSEL + SEQ_RIGHTSEL + SEQ_LOCK);
04011                 }
04012 
04013                 BLI_addtail(nseqbase, seqn);
04014                 if (seq->type == SEQ_META)
04015                     seqbase_dupli_recursive(scene, scene_to, &seqn->seqbase, &seq->seqbase, dupe_flag);
04016 
04017                 if (dupe_flag & SEQ_DUPE_CONTEXT) {
04018                     if (seq == last_seq) {
04019                         seq_active_set(scene, seqn);
04020                     }
04021                 }
04022             }
04023         }
04024     }
04025 }
